GE07bhg4c02u:1: saṃjaya uvāca taṃ tathā kṛpayāviṣṭam aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:5: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca - taṃ tathety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:6: aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule īkṣaṇe yasya taṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:7: tathā, ukta-prakāreṇa visam arjunaṃ prati madhusūdana idaṃ vākyam uvāca
GE07bhg4c02u:8: madhusūdanaḥ : ahiṃsā paramo dharmo bhikṣāśanaṃ cety evaṃ-lakṣaṇayā
GE07bhg4c02u:9: buddhyā yuddha-vaimukhyam arjunasya śrutvā svaputrāṇāṃ rājyam apracalitam avadhārya svastha-hṛdayasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya harṣa-nimittāṃ tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam
GE07bhg4c02u:10: ity ākāṅkṣām apaninīṣuḥ saṃjayas taṃ pratyuktavān ity āha vaiśampāyanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:14: arjunasya karmatvaṃ kṛpāyāś ca kartṛtvaṃ vadatā tasyā āgantukatvaṃ vyudastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:17: atra viṣādasya karmatvenārjunasya kartṛtvena ca tasyāgantukatvaṃ sūcitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:18: ataeva kṛpā-viṣāda-vaśād aśrubhiḥ pūrṇe ākule darśanākṣame cekṣaṇe yasya
GE07bhg4c02u:20: evam aśru-pāta-vyākulī-bhāvākhya-kārya-dvaya-janakatayā paripoṣaṃ gatābhyāṃ kṛpā-viṣādābhyām udvignaṃ tam arjunam idaṃ sopapattikaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ vākyam uvāca na tūpekṣitavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:23: duṣṭa-nigraha-kartārjunaṃ praty api tathaiva vakṣyatīti bhāvaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c02u:30: evam arjuna-vairāgyam upaśrutya sva-putra-rājyābhraṃśāśayā hṛṣyantaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭram ālakṣya sañjaya uvāca taṃ tatheti |
GE07bhg4c02u:31: madhusūdana iti tasya śokam api madhuvan nihaniṣyatīti bhāvaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c02u:33: śrī-bhagavān uvāca kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:35: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva vākyam āha śrī-bhagavān uvāca kuta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:36: kuto hetos tvā tvāṃ viṣame saṅkaṭe idaṃ kuśalaṃ samupasthitam ayaṃ mohaḥ prāptaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:39: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva bhagavato vākyam avatārayati kutas tveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:45: etādṛśaṃ samagramaiśvaryādikaṃ nityam apratibandhena yatra vartate sa bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:48: utpattiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c02u:49: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti || [ViP 6.78]
GE07bhg4c02u:55: bhagavac-chabdārthaḥ śrī-vāsudeva eva paryavasita iti tathocyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:57: śiṣṭa-garhitatvena malinaṃ viṣame sa-bhaye sthāne tvā tvāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:58: sarva-kṣatriya-pravaraṃ kuto hetoḥ samupasthitaṃ prāptam ? kiṃ mokṣecchātaḥ ? kiṃ vā svargecchātaḥ ? iti kiṃ-śabdenākṣipyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:59: hetu-trayam api niṣedhati tribhir viśesaṇair uttarārdhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:61: sva-dharmair āśaya-śuddhi-dvārā moks icchadbhir apakva-kaṣāyair mumukṣubhiḥ kathaṃ sva-dharmas tyājya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:66: kīrty-abhāva-karam apakīrtikaraṃ vā na kīrtīcchayā sevyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:67: tathā ca mokṣa-kāmaiḥ svarga-kāmaiḥ kīrti-kāmaiś ca varjanīyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:68: tat kāma eva tvaṃ sevasva ity aho anucitaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ taveti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c02u:75: asvargyam akīrtikaram iti pāratrikaihika-sukha-pratikūlam ity arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c02u:76: baladevaḥ : tad vākyam anuvadati śrī-bhagavān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:82: śiṣṭa-nindyatvān malinaṃ kuto hetos tvāṃ kṣatriya-cūḍāmaṇiṃ samupasthitam abhūt ? viṣame yuddha-samaye
GE07bhg4c02u:83: na ca mokṣāya svargāya kīrtaye vaitad-yuddha-vairāgyam ity āha anāryeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:90: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:92: śrīdharaḥ : klaibyaṃ mā sma gama iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:93: tasmāt he pārtha ! klaibyaṃ kātaryaṃ mā sma gamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:95: yatas tvayi etan nopapadyate yogyaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:96: kṣudraṃ tucchaṃ hṛdaya-daurbalyaṃ kātaryaṃ yuddhāya uttiṣṭha,
GE07bhg4c02u:98: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu bandhu-senāvekṣaṇa-jātenādhairyeṇa dhanur api dhārayitum aśaknuvatā mayā kiṃ kartuṃ śakyam ity ata āha klaibyam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:99: klaibyaṃ klīb-bhāvam adhairyam ojas-teja-ādi-bhaṅga-rūpaṃ mā sma gamo mā gā |
GE07bhg4c02u:100: he pārtha pṛthā-tanaya! pṛthayā deva-prasāda-labdhe tat-tanaya-mātre
GE07bhg4c02u:101: vīryātiśayasya prasiddhatvāt pṛthā-tanayatvena tvaṃ klaibyāyogya ity
GE07bhg4c02u:104: tvayi arjune sākṣān-maheśvareṇāpi saha kṛtāhave prakhyāta-mahā-prabhāve nopapadyate na yujyata etat-klaibyam ity asādhāraṇyena tad-ayogyatva-nirdeśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:105: nanu na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ iti pūrvam eva mayoktam ity āśaṅkyāha kṣudram iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:107: bhramaṇādi-rūpam adhairyaṃ kṣudratva-kāraṇatvāt kṣudraṃ sunirasanaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c02u:109: he parantapa ! paraṃ śatruṃ tāpayatīti tathā saṃbodhyate hetu-garbham ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:113: tasmān mā sma gamaḥ, mā prāpnuhi,
GE07bhg4c02u:114: anyasmin kṣatra-bandhau varam idam upapadyatām, tvayi mat-sakhau tu nopayujyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:115: nanv idaṃ śauryābhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ klaibyaṃ mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:117: bhīṣma-droṇādi-guruṣu dharma-dṛṣṭyā viveko 'yaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṣu tu durbaleṣu mad-astrāghātam āsādya martum udyateṣu dayaiveyam iti tatrāha
GE07bhg4c02u:119: naite tava viveka-daye, kintu śoka-mohāv eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:123: he parantapa ! parān śatrūn tāpayan yudhyasva ||3||
GE07bhg4c02u:124: baladevaḥ : nanu bandhu-kṣayādhyavasāya-doṣāt prakampitena mayā kiṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:125: bhāvyam iti cet tatrāha klaibyam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:127: pṛthāyām utpanna ! klaibyaṃ kātaryaṃ mā sma gamaḥ prāpnuhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:129: viśva-vijetari mat-sakhe 'rjune kṣatra-bandhāv ivaitad īdṛśaṃ klaibyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:131: nanu na me śauryābhāva-rūpaṃ klaibyaṃ kintu bhīṣmādiṣu pūjyeṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:133: mariṣyatsu kṛpeyam iti cet tatrāha kṣudram iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:140: arjuna uvāca kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana |
GE07bhg4c02u:142: śrīdharaḥ : nāhaṃ kātaratvena yuddhāt uparato 'smi, kintu yuddhasya anyāyyatvād adharmyatvāc cety āha arjuna uvāca katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:144: pūjārhau pūjāyām arho yogyau tau prati katham ahaṃ yotsyāmi, tatrāpi iṣubhiḥ yatra vācāpi yotsyāmīti vaktum anucitaṃ tatra bāṇaiḥ kathaṃ yotsyāmīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:146: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu nāyaṃ svadharmasya tyāgaḥ śoka-mohādi-vaśāt kintu dharatvābhāvād adharmatvāc cāsya yuddhasya tyāgo mayā kriyata iti
GE07bhg4c02u:149: bhīṣmaṃ pitāmahaṃ droṇām cācāryaṃ saṅkhye raṇa iṣubhiḥ sāyakaiḥ pratiyotsyāmi prahariṣyāmi katham ? na kathaṃcid apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:152: vācāpi harṣa-phalam api līlā-yuddham anucitaṃ kiṃ punar yuddha-bhūmau
GE07bhg4c02u:156: ato na madhusūdanārisūdanety asyārthasya punar uktatvaṃ doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:157: yuddha-mātram api yatra nocitaṃ dūre tatra vadha
GE07bhg4c02u:160: pūjārhayor eva vivaraṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:161: dvau brāhmaṇau bhojaya deva-dattaṃ yajña-dattaṃ cetivat sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:164: tatra tābhyāṃ saha yuddhaṃ na tāvad dharmaḥ pūjādivad avihitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:165: na cāyam aniṣiddhatvād adharmo 'pi na bhavatīti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:166: guruṃ huṅkṛtya tvaṃkṛtya ity ādinā śabda-mātreṇāpi guru-droho
GE07bhg4c02u:167: yadāniṣṭa-phalatva-pradarśanena niṣiddhas tadā kiṃ vācyaṃ tābhyāṃ saha
GE07bhg4c02u:169: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti
GE07bhg4c02u:171: ato 'haṃ yuddhān nivarta ity āha katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:173: nanv etau yudhyete tarhy anayoḥ pratiyoddhā bhavituṃ tvaṃ kiṃ na śaknoṣi ? satyaṃ na śaknomy evety āha pūjārhāv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:174: anayoś caraṇeṣu bhaktyā kusumāny eva dātum arhāmi na tu krodhena
GE07bhg4c02u:176: bho vayasya kṛṣṇa tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe haṃsi, na tu sandīpaniṃ sva-guruṃ, nāpi bandhūn yadūn ity āha he
GE07bhg4c02u:179: tatrāha he arisūdana ! madhur nāma daityo yas tavārir iti bravīmīti ||4||
GE07bhg4c02u:180: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādiṣu pratiyoddhṛṣu satsu tvayā kathaṃ na yoddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:181: āhūto na nivarteta iti yuddha-vidhānāc ca kṣatriyasyeti cet tatrāha katham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:183: iṣubhiḥ kathaṃ yotsye ? yad imau pūjārhau puṣpādibhir abhyarcyau, parihāsa-vāgbhir api yābhyāṃ yuddhaṃ na yuktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:185: pratibadhnāti hi śreyaḥ pūjya- pūjya-pūjā-vyatikramaḥ iti smṛteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:189: tad-bhāvaś ca tvam api śatrūn eva yuddhe
GE07bhg4c02u:192: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣyam apīha loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:195: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi tān ahatvā tava deha-yātrāpi na syād iti cet, tatrāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:197: akṛtvā iha-loke bhaikṣyaṃ bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreya ucitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:198: vipakṣe tu na kevalaṃ paratra duḥkhaṃ, kintu ihaiva ca naraka-duḥkham anubhaveyam ity āha hatveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:199: gurūn hatvā ihaiva tu rudhireṇa pradigdhān prakarṣeṇa liptān artha-kāmātmakān bhogān ahaṃ bhuñjīya aśnīyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:200: yad vā artha-kāmān iti gurūṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:201: artha-tṛṣṇākulatvād ete tāvad yuddhān na nivarteran tasmād etad vadhaḥ prasajyetaivety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:203: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:204: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || iti [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:205: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu bhīṣma-droṇayoḥ pūjārhatvaṃ gurutvenaiva, evam anyeṣām api kṛpādīnāṃ, na ca teṣāṃ gurutvena svīkāraḥ sāmpratam ucitaḥ -
GE07bhg4c02u:210: śiṣya-droheṇa ca kāryākārya-viveka-śūnyānām utpatha-niṣṭhānāṃ vadha eva śreyān ity āśaṅkyāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:211: gurūn ahatvā para-lokas tāvad asty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:213: no nṛpādīnāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhaikṣam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ praśasyataram ucitaṃ na tu tad-vadhena rājyam api śreya iti dharme 'pi yuddhe
GE07bhg4c02u:215: nanv avaliptatvādinā teṣāṃ gurutvābhāva ukta ity āśaṅkyāha mahānubhāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:217: tathā ca kāla-kāmādayo 'pi yair vaśīkṛtās teṣāṃ puṇyātiśaya-śālināṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:220: himaṃ jāḍyam apahantīti himahā ādityo 'gnir vā tasyaivānubhāvaḥ sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ tān |
GE07bhg4c02u:224: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo yathā || [BhP 10.33.30]
GE07bhg4c02u:225: nanu yadārtha-lubdhāḥ santo yuddhe pravṛttās tadaiṣāṃ vikrītātmanāṃ kutastyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ māhātmyaṃ, tathā coktaṃ bhīṣmeṇa yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati -
GE07bhg4c02u:226: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:227: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:229: artha-lubdhā api te mad-apekṣayā guravo bhavanty eveti punar guru-grahaṇenoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:230: tu-śabdo 'py arthe īdṛśān api gurūn hatvā bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu mokṣaṃ labheya |
GE07bhg4c02u:231: bhujyanta iti bhogā viṣayāḥ karmaṇi ghañ |
GE07bhg4c02u:232: te ca bhogā ihaiva na para-loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:233: ihāpi ca rudhira-pradigdhā ivāpayaśo-vyāptatvenātyanta-jugupsitā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:234: yadehāpy evaṃ tadā para-loka-duḥkhaṃ kiyad varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:235: athavā gurūn hatvārtha-kāmātmakān bhogān eva bhuñjīya na tu dharma-mokṣāv
GE07bhg4c02u:237: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv evaṃ te yadi svarājye 'smin nāsti jighṛkṣā, tarhi kayā vṛttyā jīviṣyasīty atrāha gurūn ahatveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:238: guru-vadham akṛtvā bhaikṣyaṃ kṣatriyair vigītam api bhikṣānnam api bhoktuṃ śreyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:239: aihika-duryaśo-lābhe 'pi pāratrikam amaṅgalaṃ tu naiva syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:240: na caiva guravo 'valiptāḥ kāryākāryam ajānantaś cādhārmika-duryodhanādy-anugatās tyājyā eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:248: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:249: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:250: iti yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati bhīṣmeṇaivoktam ataḥ sāmpratam artha-kāmatvād
GE07bhg4c02u:251: eteṣāṃ mahānubhāvatvaṃ prāktanaṃ vigalitam ? satyam, tad apy etān hatavato mama duḥkham eva syād ity āha artha-kāmānartha-lubdhān apy etān kurūn
GE07bhg4c02u:252: hatvāhaṃ bhogān bhuñjīya kintv eteṣāṃ rudhireṇa pradigdhān praliptān eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:253: ayam arthaḥ - eteṣām artha-lubdhatve 'pi mad-gurutvam asty eva,
GE07bhg4c02u:254: ataevaitad-vadhe sati guru-drohiṇo mama khalu bhogo duṣkṛti-miśraḥ syād iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:255: baladevaḥ : nanu svarājye spṛhā cet tava nāsti tarhi deha-yātrā vā kathaṃ setsyatīti cet tatrāha gurūn iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:256: gurūn ahatvā guru-vadham akṛtvā sthitasya me bhaikṣyānnaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nindyam api bhoktuṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:259: nanv ete bhīṣmādayo guravo 'pi yuddha-garvāvalepāt chadmanā
GE07bhg4c02u:260: yuṣmad-rājyāpahāraṃ yuṣmad-drohaṃ ca kurvatāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ saṃsargeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:270: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasyacit |
GE07bhg4c02u:271: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ || [ṃBh 6.41.36]
GE07bhg4c02u:272: iti bhīṣmokter artha-lobhena vikrītātmanāṃ teṣāṃ kuto mahānubhāvatā ? tato yuddhe hantavyās te iti cet tatrāha hatvārtha-kāmān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:273: artha-kāmān api gurūn hatvāham ihaiva loke bhogān bhuñjīya, na tu para-loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:274: tāṃś ca rudhira-pradigdhān tad-rudhira-miśrān eva, na tu śuddhān bhuñjīya
GE07bhg4c02u:277: mad-gurutvam asty eveti punar guru-grahaṇena sūcyate ||5||
GE07bhg4c02u:279: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:280: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:281: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca yadyapy adharmam aṅgīkariṣyāmaḥ tathāpi kim asmākaṃ jayaḥ parājayo vā garīyān bhaved iti na jñāyata ity āha na ced ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:282: etad dvayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarat kiṃ nāma garīyo 'dhikataraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:285: yad vā etān vayaṃ jayema jeṣyāmaḥ yadi vā no 'smān ete jayeyuḥ jeṣyantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:286: jayo 'pi kiṃ cāsmākaṃ katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:288: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati etān vayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:289: jayema, no 'smān vā ete jayeyur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:290: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:291: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu bhikṣāśanasya kṣatriyaṃ prati niṣiddhatvād yuddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:292: ca vihitatvāt svadharmatvena yuddham eva tatra śreyaskaram ity āśaṅkyāha na caitad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:293: etad api na jānīmo bhaikṣa-yuddhayor madhye kataran no
GE07bhg4c02u:295: kiṃ bhaikṣaṃ hiṃsā-śūnyatvād uta yuddhaṃ svadharmatvād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:296: idaṃ ca na vidma ārabdhe 'pi yuddhe yad vā vayaṃ jayemātiśayīmahi yadi vā no 'smān jayeyur dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:299: kiṃ ca jāto 'pi jayo naḥ phalataḥ parājaya eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:300: yato yān bandhūn hatvā jīvitum api vayaṃ necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar viṣayānupabhoktum ? ta evāvasthitāḥ saṃmukhe dhārtarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭra-sambandhino bhīṣma-droṇādayaḥ sarve 'pi
GE07bhg4c02u:301: | tasmād bhaikṣād yuddhasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ na siddham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:302: tad evaṃ prāktanena granthena saṃsāra-doṣa-nirūpaṇād adhikāri-viśeṣaṇāny
GE07bhg4c02u:304: tatra na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity atra raṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:305: hatasya parivrāṭ-samāna-yoga-kṣematvokteḥ anyac chreyo 'nyad utaiva preyaḥ [KaṭhU 2.1] ity ādi-śruti-siddhaṃ śreyo mokṣākhyam upanyastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:306: arthāc ca tad itarad aśreya iti nityānitya-vastu-viveko darśitaḥ, na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:311: 1.44] ity atra sthūla-dehātirikta ātmā, kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti
GE07bhg4c02u:314: yadyapy ete na paśyanti [Gītā 1.38] ity atra nirlobhatā |
GE07bhg4c02u:318: asmiṃs tv adhyāye śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam api
GE07bhg4c02u:320: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca guru-drohe pravṛttasyāpi mama jayaḥ parājayo vā bhaved ity api na jñāyata ity āha na caitad ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:322: katarat jaya-parājayayor madhye kiṃ khalu garīyo 'dhikataraṃ bhaviṣyati etan na vidmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:323: tad eva pakṣa-dvayaṃ darśayati -- etān vayaṃ jayema, no
GE07bhg4c02u:325: kiṃ ca jayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya evety āha yān eveti ||6||
GE07bhg4c02u:326: baladevaḥ : nanu bhaikṣa-bhojanaṃ kṣatriyasya vigarhitaṃ, yuddhaṃ ca sva-dharmaṃ vijānann api vibhāṣase iti cet tatrāha na caitad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:328: bhaikṣya-yuddhayor madhye no 'smākaṃ katarad garīyaḥ praśastataram |
GE07bhg4c02u:329: hiṃsā-virahād bhaikṣaṃ garīyaḥ svadharmatvād yuddhaṃ veti,
GE07bhg4c02u:331: samārabdhe yuddhe vayaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān jayema te vā no 'smān jayeyur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:332: nanu mahā-vikramiṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ ca bhavatām eva vijayo bhāvīti cet tatrāha yān eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:334: na jijīviṣāmo jīvitum api necchāmaḥ kiṃ punar bhogān bhoktum ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:335: tathā ca vijayo 'py asmākaṃ phalataḥ parājaya eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:336: tasmād yuddhasya bhaikṣād garīyas tvam aprasiddham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:337: evam etāvatā granthena tasmād evaṃvic chānta-dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhānvito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet
GE07bhg4c02u:339: tatra kiṃ no rājyena [Gītā 1.32] iti śama-damau |
GE07bhg4c02u:342: bhaikṣaṃ bhoktuṃ śreya iti dvandva-sahiṣṇutva-lakṣaṇā titikṣā |
GE07bhg4c02u:344: śraddhā tūttara-vākye vyaktībhaviṣyati, na khalu śamādi-śūnyasya jñāne
GE07bhg4c02u:349: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam ||7||
GE07bhg4c02u:350: śrīdharaḥ : upadeśa-grahaṇe svādhikāraṃ sūcayati kārpaṇyety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:352: kārpaṇya-doṣopahata-svabhāvaḥ etān hatvā kathaṃ jīviṣyāma iti kārpaṇyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:353: dosaś ca svakula-kṣaya-kṛtaḥ, tābhyām upahato 'bhibhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:354: śauryādi-lakṣaṇo yasya so 'haṃ tvāṃ pṛcchāmi, tathā dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ ceto yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:355: yuddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣāṭanam api kṣatriyasya dharmo 'dharmo
GE07bhg4c02u:357: ato me yan niścitaṃ śreyaḥ yuktaṃ syāt tad brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:359: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya ||7||
GE07bhg4c02u:365: śruti-siddha-bhikṣā-carye 'rjunasyābhilāṣaṃ pradarśya vidhivad gurūpasattim api tat-saṅkaṭa-vyājenaiva darśayati kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:366: yaḥ svalpām api citta-kṣatiṃ na kṣamate sa kṛpaṇa iti loke prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:368: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10]
GE07bhg4c02u:371: janmany eta eva madīyās teṣu hateṣu kiṃ jīvitenety abhiniveśa-rūpo
GE07bhg4c02u:372: mamatā-lakṣaṇo doṣas tenopahatas tiraskṛtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṣātro yuddhodyoga-lakṣaṇo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c02u:373: dharme viṣaye nirṇāyaka-pramāṇaādarśanāt saṃmūḍhaṃ kim eteṣāṃ vadho dharmaḥ kim
GE07bhg4c02u:375: tathā kiṃ pṛthvī-paripālanaṃ dharmaḥ kiṃ vā
GE07bhg4c02u:376: yathāvasthito 'raṇya-nivāsa eva dharma ity ādi-saṃśayair vyāptaṃ ceto yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c02u:377: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīya ity atra vyākhyātam etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:378: evaṃvidhaḥ sann ahaṃ tvā tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi śreya ity anuṣaṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:379: ato yan niścitam aikāntikam ātyantikaṃ ca śreyaḥ parama-pumartha-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:380: phalaṃ syāt tan me mahyaṃ brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:382: yathā hy auṣadhe kṛte kadācid roga-nivṛttir na bhaved api jātāpi ca roga-nivṛttiḥ punar api rogotpattyā vināśyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:383: evaṃ kṛte 'pi yāge pratibandha-vaśāt svargo na bhaved api jāto 'pi svargo duḥkhākrānto naśyati ceti naikāntikatvam ātyantikatvaṃ vā tayoḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:389: nanu tvaṃ mama sakhā na tu śiṣyo 'ta āha śiṣyas te 'ham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:390: tvad-anuśāsanayogyatvād ahaṃ tava śiṣya eva bhavāmi na sakhā
GE07bhg4c02u:392: atas tvāṃ prapannaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ śādhi śikṣaya karuṇayā na tv aśiṣyatva-śaṅkayopekṣaṇīyo 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:393: etena - tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham
GE07bhg4c02u:396: adhīhi bhagavo brahmeti [TaittU 3.1] ity ādi-gurūpasatti-pratipādakaḥ śruty-artho
GE07bhg4c02u:398: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tarhi sopapattikaṃ śāstrārthaṃ tvam eva bruvāṇaḥ kṣatriyo bhūtvā bhikṣāṭanaṃ niścinoṣi tarhy alaṃ mad-uktyeti tatrāha kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:399: svābhāvikasya śauryasya tyāga eva me kārpaṇyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:400: dharmasya sūkṣmā gatir ity ato dharma-vyavasthāyām apy ahaṃ mūḍha-buddhir evāsmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:401: atas tvam eva niścitya śreyo brūhi |
GE07bhg4c02u:402: nanu mad-vācas tvaṃ paṇḍata-mānitvena khaṇḍayasi cet, kathaṃ brūyām ?
GE07bhg4c02u:405: baladevaḥ : atha tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:407: 6.14.2] ity ādi śruti-siddhāṃ gurūpasattiṃ darśayati kārpaṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:408: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śravaṇād abrahmavittvaṃ kārpaṇyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:409: tena hetunā yo doṣo yān eva hatveti
GE07bhg4c02u:412: dharme saṃmūḍhaṃ kṣatriyasya me yuddhaṃ svadharmas tad vihāya bhikṣāṭanaṃ vety evaṃ sandihānaṃ ceto yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:413: īdṛśaḥ sann ahaṃ tvām idānīṃ pṛcchāmi - tasmān niścitaṃ ekāntikaṃ ātyantikaṃ yan me
GE07bhg4c02u:417: nanu śaraṇāgatasyopadeśaḥ tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet ity ādi-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:418: sakhāyaṃ tvāṃ katham upadiśāmīti cet tatrāha śiṣyas te 'ham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:422: na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām |
GE07bhg4c02u:423: avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam ||8||
GE07bhg4c02u:424: śrīdharaḥ : tvam eva vicārya yad yuktaṃ tat kurv iti cet, tatrāha na hi
GE07bhg4c02u:426: indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam atiśoṣaṇa-karaṃ madīyaṃ śokaṃ yat
GE07bhg4c02u:427: karma apanudyāt apanayet tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:428: yadyapi bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ samṛddhaṃ rājyaṃ prāpsyāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:429: tathā surendratvam api yadi prāpsyāmi evam abhīṣṭaṃ tat tat sarvam avāpyāpi śokāpanodanopāyaṃ na prapaśyāmīty anvayaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c02u:430: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu svayam eva tvaṃ śreyo vicāraya śruta-sampanno 'si kiṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:432: yac-chreyaḥ prāptaṃ sat-kartṛ mama śokam apanudyād apanuden nivārayet tan na paśyāmi hi yasmāt tasmān māṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:433: śādhīti so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñ chokasya pāraṃ tārayatu [ChāU 7.1.3] iti śruty-artho darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:434: śokānapanode ko doṣa ity āśaṅkya tad-viśeṣaṇam āha indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:436: nanu yuddhe prayatamānasya tava śoka-nivṛttir bhaviṣyati jeṣyasi cet tadā
GE07bhg4c02u:437: rājya-prāptyā dvāv etau puruṣau loke ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād ity āśaṅkyāha avāpyety ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:438: śatru-varjitaṃ sasyādi-sampannaṃ ca rājyaṃ tathā surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhatva-paryantam aiśvaryam avāpya sthitasyāpi mama yac chokam apanudyāt tan na paśyāmīty anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:440: lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [Chā 8.1.6] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:441: yat-kṛtakaṃ tad-anityam ity anumānāt pratyakṣeṇāpy aihikānāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:442: vināśa-darśanāc ca naihika āmutriko vā bhogaḥ śoka-nivartakaḥ kintu
GE07bhg4c02u:444: choka-janaka eveti na yuddhaṃ śoka-nivṛttaye 'nuṣṭheyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:446: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu mayi tava sakhya-bhāva eva, na tu gauravam |
GE07bhg4c02u:447: atas tvāṃ katham ahaṃ śiṣyaṃ karomi ? tasmād yatra tava gauravaṃ taṃ kam api dvaipāyanādikaṃ prapadyasva ity ata āha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:448: mama śokam apanudyāt dūrīkuryād evaṃ janaṃ na prakarṣeṇa paśyāmi trijagaty ekaṃ tvāṃ vinā
GE07bhg4c02u:449: svasmād adhika-buddhimantaṃ bṛhaspatim api na jānāmīty ataḥ śokārta eva khalu kaṃ prapadyeya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:450: yad yataḥ śokād indriyāṇām ucchoṣaṇaṃ mahā-nidāghāt kṣudra-sarasām iva utkarṣeṇa śoṣo bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:451: nanu tarhi sāmprataṃ tvaṃ śokārta eva khalu yudhyasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:452: tataś caitān jitvā rājyaṃ prātavatas tava rājya-bhogābhiniveśenaiva śoko 'payāsyatīty āha avāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:453: bhūmau niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ vā prāpyāpi sthitasya mamendriyāṇām etad ucchoṣaṇam evety arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c02u:454: baladevaḥ : nanu tvaṃ śāstrajño 'si sva-hitaṃ vicāryānutiṣṭha, sakhyur me śiṣyaḥ kathaṃ bhaver iti cet tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:455: yat karma mama śokam apanudyād dūrīkuryāt tad ahaṃ na prapaśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:459: 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ māṃ bhavān śokasya pāraṃ tārayatu iti śruty-artho
GE07bhg4c02u:461: nanu tvam adhunā śokākulaḥ prapadyase yuddhāt sukha-samṛddhi-lābhe viśoko bhaviṣyasīti cet tatrāha avāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:462_0: yadi yuddhe vijayī syāṃ tadā bhūmāv asapatnaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ prāpya yadi ca tatra
GE07bhg4c02u:462_1: hataḥ syāṃ tadā svarge surāṇām ādhipatyaṃ prāpya sthitasya me viśokatvaṃ na bhaved
GE07bhg4c02u:463: tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate [ChāU 8.1.6] iti śruter naihikaṃ pāratrikaṃ vā yuddha-labdhaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:464: sukhaṃ śokāpahaṃ tasmāt tādṛśam eva śreyastvaṃ brūhīti na yuddhaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:467: saṃjaya uvāca evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ parantapaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:468: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha ||9||
GE07bhg4c02u:469: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvārjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam
GE07bhg4c02u:472: madhusūdanaḥ : tad-anantaram arjunaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭrākāṅkṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:474_1: vāṇīṃ vindatīti vyutpattyā sarva-vedopādānatvena sarvajñam ādāv evaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam
GE07bhg4c02u:475: uktvā tad-anantaraṃ na yotsya iti yuddha-phalābhāvaṃ coktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva
GE07bhg4c02u:476: bāhyendriya-vyāpārasya yuddhārthaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtasya nivṛttyā nirvyāpāro jāta
GE07bhg4c02u:478: svabhāvato jitālasye sarva-śatru-tāpane ca tasminn āgantukam
GE07bhg4c02u:479: ālasyam atāpakatvaṃ ca nāspadam ādhāsyatīti dyotayituṃ ha-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:483: baladevaḥ : tato 'rjunaḥ kim akarod ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:484: guḍākeśo hṛṣīkeśaṃ prati evaṃ na hi prapaśyāmīty ādinā yuddhasya śokānivartakatvam uktvā parantapo 'pi govindaṃ sarva-vedajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:485: prati na yotsye iti coktveti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:487: sarva-veda-vittvād yuddhe sva-dharmatvaṃ grāhayiṣyatīti vyajya dhṛtarāṣṭra-hṛdi saṃjātā sva-putra-rājyāśā nirasyate ||9||
GE07bhg4c02u:489: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata |
GE07bhg4c02u:490: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:491: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha tam uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:492: prahasann iva prasanna-mukhaḥ sann ity arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:493: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yuddham upekṣitavaty apy arjune bhagavān nopekṣitavān iti dhṛtarāṣṭra-durāśā-nirāsāyā 'ha tam uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c02u:494_0: senayor ubhayor madhye yuddhodyamenāgatya tad-virodhinaṃ viṣādaṃ mohaṃ prāpnuvantaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:494_1: tam arjunaṃ prahasann ivānucitācāraṇa-prakāśanena lajjāmbudhau majjayann iva hṛṣīkeśaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:494_2: sarvāntaryāmī bhagavān idaṃ vakṣyamāṇam aśocyān ity ādi vacaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:495: parama-gambhīrārtham anucitācaraṇa-prakāśakam uktavān na t”pekṣitavān ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:500: anucitācaraṇa-prakāśanasya ca vivekotpatti-hetutvād eka-dalābhāvena gauṇa evāyaṃ prahāsa iti kathayitum iva-śabdaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:501: lajjām utpādayitum iva vivkam utpādayitum arjunasyānucitācaraṇaṃ bhagavatā prakāśyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:502: lajjotpattis tu nāntarīyakatayāstu māstu veti na vivakṣiteti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:503: yadi hi yuddhārambhāt prāg eva sthito yuddham upekṣeta tadā nānucitaṃ kuryāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:504: mahatā saṃrambheṇa tu yuddha-bhūmāv āgatya tad-upekṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:505: atīvānucitam iti kathayituṃ senayor ity ādi-viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:507: viśvanāthaḥ : aho tvāpy etāvān khalv aviveka iti sakhya-bhāvena taṃ prahasan anaucitya-prakāśena lajjāmbudhau nimajjayan iveti tadānīṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:508: śiṣya-bhāvaṃ prāpte tasmin hāsyam anucitam ity adharoṣṭha-nikuñcanena
GE07bhg4c02u:513: senayor ubhayor madhe ity arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā prabodhaś ca ubhābhyāṃ senābhyāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭa eveti bhāvaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:514: baladevaḥ : vyaṅgam arthaṃ prakāśayann āha tam uvāceti taṃ viṣīdantam arjunaṃ prati hṛṣīkeśo bhagavān aśocyān ity ādikam atigambhīrārthaṃ vacanam uvāca |
GE07bhg4c02u:517: iveti tadaiva śiṣyatāṃ prāpte tasmin hāsānaucityādīṣad adharollāsaṃ kurvann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:518: arjunasya viṣādo bhagavatā tasyopadeśaś ca sarva-sākṣika iti bodhayituṃ senayor ubhayor ity etat ||10||
GE07bhg4c02u:520: śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase |
GE07bhg4c02u:522: śrīdharaḥ : dehātmanor avivekād asyaivaṃ śoko bhavatīti tad-viveka-darśanārthaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśocyān ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:523: śokasyāviṣayī-bhūtān eva bandhūn tvam anvaśocaḥ anuśocitavān asi dṛṣṭvemān svajanān kṛṣṇa ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:524_0: tatra kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam ity ādinā mayā bodhito 'pi punaś
GE07bhg4c02u:524_1: ca prajñāvatāṃ paṇḍitānāṃ vādān śabdān kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīn kevalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:524_2: bhāṣase, na tu paṇḍito 'si, yataḥ gatāsūn gata-prāṇān bandhūn agatāsūṃś ca jīvato
GE07bhg4c02u:525: bandhu-hīnā ete kathaṃ jīviṣyantīti nānuśocanti paṇḍitā vivekinaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c02u:526: madhusūdanaḥ : HERE viśvanāthaḥ : bho arjuna ! tavāyaṃ bandha-vadha-hetukaḥ śoko bhrama-mūlaka
GE07bhg4c02u:527: eva, tathā kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādiko vivekaś cāprajñā-mūlaka
GE07bhg4c02u:529: aśocyān śokānārhān eva tvam anvaśoco 'nuśocitavān asi |
GE07bhg4c02u:530: tathā tvāṃ prabodhayantaṃ māṃ prati prajñā-vādān
GE07bhg4c02u:531: prajñāyāṃ satyām eva ye vādāḥ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādīni vākyāni tān bhāṣase, na tu tava kāpi prajñā vartate iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:532: yataḥ paṇḍitāḥ prajñāvanto gatāsūn gatā niḥsṛtā bhavanty asavo yebhyas tān
GE07bhg4c02u:533: sthūla-dehān na śocanti, teṣāṃ naśvara-bhāvatvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:535: aniḥsṛta-prāṇān sūkṣma-dehān api na śocanti, te hi mukteḥ pūrvaṃ naśvarā eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:536: ubhayeṣām api tathā tathā svabhāvasya duṣpariharatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:537: mūrkhās tu pirtrādi-dehebhyaḥ prāṇeṣu niḥsṛteṣv eva śocanti, sūkṣma-dehāṃs tu na, te prāyaḥ paricinvantyas atas tair alam |
GE07bhg4c02u:541: śoka-pravṛttir eva nāstīty atas tvayā yat pūrvam artha-śāstrāt
GE07bhg4c02u:542: dharma-śāstraṃ balavad ity uktaṃ tatra mayā tu dharma-śāstrād api
GE07bhg4c02u:543: jñāna-śāstraṃ balavad ity ucyata iti bhāvaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c02u:544: baladevaḥ : evaṃ arjune tūṣṇīṃ sthite tad-buddhim ākṣipan bhagavān āha
GE07bhg4c02u:546: he arjuna ! aśocyān śocitum ayogyān eva dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:548: tathā māṃ prati prajñā-vādān prajñāvatām iva vacanāni dṛṣṭvemaṃ svajanam ity ādīni, kathaṃ bhīṣmam ity ādīni ca bhāṣase, na ca te prajñā-leśo 'py astīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:549: ye tu prajñāvantas te gatāsūn nirgata-prāṇān sthūla-dehān, agatāsūṃś cānirgata-prāṇān
GE07bhg4c02u:550: sūkṣma-dehāṃś ca, śabdād ātmanaś ca na śocanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:552: sthūla-dehānāṃ vināśitvāt, nāntyaḥ sūkṣma-dehānāṃ mukteḥ prāg avaināśitvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:553: tadvatām ātmanāṃ tu ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-varjitānāṃ nityatvān na śocyāteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:560: paṇḍitasya te na yogya iti bhāvaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c02u:562: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:563: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:564: śrīdharaḥ : aśocyatve hetum āha na tv evāham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:565: yathāhaṃ parameśvaro jātu kadācit līlā-vigrahasyāvirbhāva-tirobhāvato nāsam iti tu naiva |
GE07bhg4c02u:567: na ca tvaṃ nāsīḥ nābhūḥ, api tv āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:568: ime vā janādhipā nṛpā nāsann iti na, api tu āsann eva mad-aṃśatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:569: tathātaḥ param ita upary api na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti ca naiva, api tu sthāsyāma eveti janma-maraṇa-śūnyatvād aśocyā ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:571: viśvanāthaḥ : athavā sakhe tvām aham evaṃ pṛcchāmi |
GE07bhg4c02u:572: kiṃ ca prītyāspadasya maraṇe dṛṣṭe sati śoko jāyate, tatreha prītyāspadam ātmā deho vā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:573_0: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ nṛpa svātmaiva vallabhaḥ [BhP 10.14.57] iti śukokter ātmaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:573_1: prīty-āspadam iti cet tarhi jīveśvara-bhedena dvividhasyaivātmano nityatvād eva maraṇābhāvād
GE07bhg4c02u:573_2: ātmā śokasya viṣayo nety āha na tv evāham iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:574: ahaṃ paramātmā jātu kadācid api pūrvaṃ nāsam iti na, api tv āsam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:575: tathā tvam api jīvātmā āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:576: tatheme janādhipā rājānaś ca jīvātmāna āsann eveti prāg-abhāvābhāvo darśitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:577: tathā sarve vayam ahaṃ tvam ime janādhipāś cātaḥ paraṃ na bhaviṣyāmo na sthāsyāma iti na, api tu sthāsyāma
GE07bhg4c02u:578: eveti dhvaṃsābhāvaś ca darśita iti paramātmano jīvātmanāṃ ca nityatvād ātmā na śoka-viṣaya iti sādhitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:580: cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] ity ādyāḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c02u:581: baladevaḥ : evam asthāna-śocitvād apāṇḍityam arjunasyāpādya tattva-jijñāsuṃ niyojitāñjaliṃ taṃ prati sarveśvaro bhagavān nityo
GE07bhg4c02u:582: nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti
GE07bhg4c02u:583: śruti-siddhaṃ svasmāj jīvānāṃ ca pāramarthikaṃ bhedam āha na tv evāham iti
GE07bhg4c02u:584: | he arjuna ! ahaṃ sarveśvaro bhagavān itaḥ pūrvasminn ādau kāle jātu kadācin nāsam iti na, api tv āsam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:585: tathā tvam arjuno nāsīr iti na, kintv āsīr eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:586: ime janādhipā rājāno nāsann iti na, kintv āsann eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:587: tathetaḥ parasminn ante kāle sarve vayam ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ime ca na bhaviṣyāma iti na, kintu bhaviṣyāma eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:588: sarveśvaravaj jīvānāṃ ca traikālika-sattā-yogitvāt tad-viṣayako na śoko yukta ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:591: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi
GE07bhg4c02u:596: maru-marīcikādāv udaka-buddhir bādhitāpy anuvartamānā mithyārtha-viṣayatva-niścayān nodakāharaṇādau pravartayed evam
GE07bhg4c02u:601: bhedas tad-viṣayo na syāt, kintu adbhyo vā eṣa prātar udety apaḥ sāyaṃ praviśati ity ādi-śruty-arthavad
GE07bhg4c02u:602: anuvādya eva sa iti cen mandam etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:603: pṛthag ātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti [ŚvetU 1.6] ity ādinā bheda
GE07bhg4c02u:612: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā |
GE07bhg4c02u:613: tathā dehāntara-prāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati ||13||
GE07bhg4c02u:614: śrīdharaḥ : nanv īśvarasya tava janmādi-śūnyatvaṃ satyam eva, jīvānāṃ tu janma-maraṇe prasiddhe
GE07bhg4c02u:616: dehino dehābhimānino jīvasya yathāsmin sthūla-dehe kaumārādy-avasthās tad-deha-nibandhanā
GE07bhg4c02u:617: na tu svataḥ, pūrvāvāsthā-nāśe |vasthāntarotpattāv api sa evāham iti pratyabhijñānāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:622: ato dhīro dhīmān tatra tayor deha-nāśotpattyor na muhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:623: ātmaiva mṛto jātaś ceti na manyate
GE07bhg4c02u:625: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu cātma-sambandhena deho 'pi prīty-āspadaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:627: | atas teṣāṃ nāśe śokaḥ syād eveti ced ata āha dehina iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:628: dehino jīvasyāsmin dehe kaumāra kaumāraṃ kaumāra-prāptir bhavati, tataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:629: kaumāra-nāśānantaraṃ jarā-prāptir yathā tathaiva dehāntara-prāptir iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:630: tatas cātma-sambandhināṃ kaumārādīnāṃ prīty-āspadānāṃ nāśe yathā śoko na kriyate tathā dehasyāpi ātma-sambandhinaḥ prītyāspadasya nāśe śoko na kartavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:631: yauvanasya nāśe jarā-prāptau śoko jāyate iti cet kaumārasya nāśe yauvana-prāptau harṣo 'pi jāyate ity ato bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:632: jīrṇa-deha-nāśe khalu navya-dehāntara-prāptau tarhi harṣaḥ kriyatām iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:633: yad vā, ekasminn api dehe kaumārādīnāṃ yathā prāptis
GE07bhg4c02u:634: tathaivaikasyāpi dehino jīvasya nānā-dehānāṃ prāptir iti ||13||
GE07bhg4c02u:636: tad-dehānāṃ tad-bhogāyatanānāṃ nāśe yuktaḥ śoka iti cet tatrāha dehino
GE07bhg4c02u:638: traikālikā bahavo dehā yasya santi, tasya dehino jīvasyāsmin
GE07bhg4c02u:639: vartamāne dehe kramāt kaumāra-yauvana-jarās tisro 'vasthā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:642: para-para-prāptau yathā na śokas tathaiva tad-deha-vināśe sati
GE07bhg4c02u:648: atrāhuḥ - eka eva viśuddhātmā tasyāvidyayāparicchinnasya tasyāṃ pratibimbitasya vā nānātmatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:649: śrutiś caivam āha ākāśam ekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthag bhavet, tathātmaiko hy anekastho jalādhāreṣv ivāṃśumān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:650: tad-vijñānena tasya vināśe tu tan-nānātva-nivṛttyā tad-aikyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:654: vāstave cchede vikāritvādy-āpattiḥ ṭaṅka-chinna-pāṣāṇavat syāt - nīrūpasya vibhoḥ pratibimbāsambhavāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:656: na ca pratīty-anyathānupapattir evākāśasya pratibimbe mānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:658: ākāśam ekaṃ hi iti śrutis tu paramātma-viṣayā tasyākāśavat sūryavac ca bahu-vṛttikatvaṃ vadatīty aviruddham |
GE07bhg4c02u:660: sa hi tattvavin na vā ? ādye 'dvitīyam ātmānaṃ vijānatas tasyopadeśyāpari-sphūrtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:666: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tān ahaṃ na śocāmi, kintu tad-viyogādi-duḥkha-bhājaṃ mām eveti cet tatrāha mātrā-sparśā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:667: mīyante jāyante viṣayā ābhir iti mātrā indriya-vṛttayaḥ, tāsāṃ sparśā viṣayeṣu sambaddhāḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:672: svabhāvataḥ śītoṣṇādi prayacchanti evam iṣṭa-saṃyoga-viyogā api
GE07bhg4c02u:673: sukha-duḥkhāni prayacchanti, teṣāṃ cāsthiratvāt sahanaṃ tava dhīrasyocitaṃ na tu tan-nimitta-harṣa-viṣāda-pāravaśyam ity arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c02u:676: tad apy avivekino mama mana evānarthakāni vṛtahiva śoka-moha-vyāptaṃ duḥkhayatīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:677: tatra na kevalam ekaṃ mana evāpi tu manaso vṛttayo 'pi sarvās tv agādīndriya-rūpāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:678: sva-viṣayān anubhāvyānarthakāriṇya ity āha mātrā indriya-grāhya-viṣayās
GE07bhg4c02u:680: śītoṣṇety āgamāpāyina iti yad eva śītala-jalādikam uṣṇa-kāle sukhadam |
GE07bhg4c02u:681: tad eva śīta-kāle duḥkhadam ato 'niyatatvād āgamāpāyitvāc ca tān viṣayānubhavān titikṣasva sahasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:684: duḥkhatva-buddhyaiva śāstre vihitaḥ snāna-rūpo dharmas tyajyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:687: putra-bhrātrādyotpatti-kāle dhanādy-upārjana-kāle ca sukhadās ta eva
GE07bhg4c02u:688: mṛtyu-kāle duḥkhadā āgamāpāyino 'nityās tān api titikṣasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:689: na tu tad-anurodhena yuddha-rūpaḥ śāstra-vihitaḥ sva-dharmas tyājyo
GE07bhg4c02u:690: vihita-dharmānācaraṇaṃ khalu kāle mahānarthakṛd eveti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c02u:691: baladevaḥ : nanu bhīṣmādayo mṛtāḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīti tad-duḥkha-nimittaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:695: mātrās tv agādīndriya-vṛttayaḥ mīyante paricchidyante viṣayā abhir iti vyutpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:696: sparśās tābhir viṣayāṇām anubhavānte khalu śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkhadā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:697: yad eva śītalam udakaṃ grīṣme sukhadaṃ tad eva hemante duḥkhadam ity ato 'niyatatvād
GE07bhg4c02u:698: āgamāpāyitvāc cānityān asthirāṃs tān titikṣasva sahasva |
GE07bhg4c02u:699: etad uktaṃ bhavati māgha-snānaṃ duḥkha-karam api dharmatayā vidhānād yathā kriyate tathā bhīṣmādibhiḥ saha yuddhaṃ duḥkha-karam api tathā vidhānāt kāryam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:700: tatratyo duḥkhānubhavas tv āgantuko dharma-siddhatvāt soḍhavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:701: dharmāj jñānodayena mokṣa-lābhe tūttaratra tasya nānuvṛttiś ca
GE07bhg4c02u:702: jñāna-niṣṭhā paripākaṃ vinaiva dharma-tyāgas tv anartha-hetur iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:703: kaunteya bhārateti padābhyām ubhaya-kula-śuddhasya te dharma-bhraṃśo
GE07bhg4c02u:706: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha |
GE07bhg4c02u:713: sa tair avikṣipyamāṇo dharma-jñāna-dvārā amṛtatvāya mokṣāya kalpate yogyo bhavati ||15||
GE07bhg4c02u:715: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ vicāreṇa tat-tat-sahanābhyāse sati te viṣayānubhavāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:722_0: ete mātrā-sparśāḥ priyāpriya-viṣayānubhāvā yaṃ dhīraṃ dhiyam īrayati dharmeṣv iti
GE07bhg4c02u:722_1: vyutpatter dharma-niṣṭhaṃ puruṣaṃ na vyathayanti sukha-duḥkha-mūrcchitaṃ na kurvanti
GE07bhg4c02u:723: na tu tādṛśo duḥkha-sukha-mūrcchita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:724: uktam arthaṃ sphuṭayan puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi sameti |
GE07bhg4c02u:726: duḥkham anuṣaṅga-labdhaṃ sukhaṃ ca yasya samaṃ bhavati tābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:729: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:730: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattva-darśibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c02u:731: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tathāpi śītoṣṇādikam atiduḥsahaṃ kathaṃ soḍhavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:732: atyantaṃ tat-sahane ca kadācid deha-nāśaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c02u:733: tattva-vicārataḥ sarvaṃ soḍhuṃ śakyam ity āśayenāha nāsato vidyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:734: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād avidyamānasya śītoṣṇāder ātmani bhāvaḥ sattā na
GE07bhg4c02u:736: tathā sataḥ sat-svabhāvasyātmano 'bhāvo nāśo na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:737: evam ubhayoḥ sad-asator anto nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:742: viśvanāthaḥ : etac ca viveka-daśān adhirūḍhān prati uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:743: vastutas tu asaṅgo hy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ iti śruter jīvātmanaś ca sthūla-sūkṣma-dehābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:744: tad-dharmaiḥ śoka-mohādibhiś ca sambandho nāsty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:747: asato 'nātma-dharmatvād ātmani jīve avartamānasya śoka-mohādes tad-āśrayasya dehasya ca bhāvaḥ sattā nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:748: tathā sataḥ satya-rūpasya jīvātmano 'bhāvo nāśo nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:749: tasmād ubhayor etayor asat-sator anto nirṇayo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:750: tena bhīṣmādiṣu tvad-ādiṣu ca jīvātmasu satyatvād anaśvareṣu deha-daihika-viveka-śoka-mohādayo naiva santi kathaṃ bhīṣmādayo naṅkṣanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:751: kathaṃ vā tāṃs tvaṃ śocasīti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:752: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ bhagavatā pārthasyāsthānāśocitvena tat-pāṇḍityam
GE07bhg4c02u:754: śoka-haraṃ ca svopāsanam eva tac copāsopāsaka-bheda-ghaṭitam

GE07bhg4c02u:768: 2.12.38] ity upakramya yad asti yan nāsti ca vipra-varya [?] ity asti |

GE07bhg4c02u:789: | eṣoṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyo yasmin prāṇaḥ pañcadhā saṃviveśa iti,
GE07bhg4c02u:792: ārāgra-mātro hy aparo 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ iti śrutibhyaś ca tasya paramāṇu-parimāṇatvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:794: jatu-jaṭitasya mahā-maṇer mahauṣadhi-khaṇḍasya vā śirasy urasi vā dhṛtasya sampūrṇa-deha-puṣṭi-karaṇa-śaktimattvam iva nāsamañjasam |
GE07bhg4c02u:796: tad uktaṃ prāṇam adhikṛtya dattātrayeṇa yena saṃsarate pumān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:799: ataevāvyayasya nityasya nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān [ŚvetU 6.13] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:800: yad vā, nanu deho jīvātmā paramātmety etad vastu-trikaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:801: manuṣya-tiryag-ādiṣu sarvatra dṛśyate, tatrādyayor deha-jīvayos tattvaṃ nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity anenoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:802: tṛtīyasya paramātma-vastunaḥ kiṃ tattvam ity ata āha avināśi tv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:806: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ jīvātma-dehayoḥ svabhāvaṃ viśadayaty avināśīti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c02u:808: yena sarvam idaṃ śarīraṃ tataṃ dharma-bhūtena jñānena vyāptam asti |
GE07bhg4c02u:809: asyāvyayasya parmāṇutvena ca vināśānarhasya vināśaṃ na kaścit sthūlo 'rthaḥ kartum arhati

GE07bhg4c02u:815: evam āha bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ - guṇād vālokavad [Vs. 2.3.26] iti |

GE07bhg4c02u:824: ataevānāśino vināśa-rahitasya aprameyasyaparicchinnasyātmana ime sukha-duḥkhādi-dharmaka-dehā uktās tattva-darśibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:825: yasmād evam ātmano na vināśaḥ, na ca sukha-duḥkhādi-sambandhaḥ, tasmān mohajaṃ śoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:828: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu sphuraṇa-rūpasya sataḥ katham avināśitvaṃ tasya
GE07bhg4c02u:829: deha-dharmatvād dehasya cānukṣaṇa-vināśād iti bhūta-caitanya-vādinas tān nirākurvann āsato vidyate bhāva ity etad vivṛṇoti antavanta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:830: antavanto vināśina ime 'parokṣā dehā upacitāpacita-rūpatvāc charīrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:834: sambandhino dṛśyatvena bhogyatvena coktāḥ śrutibhir brahma-vādibhiś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:835: tathā ca taittirīyake 'nnamayādyānandamayānantān pañca kośān kalpayitvā
GE07bhg4c02u:836: tad-adhiṣṭhānam akalpitaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā [TaittU 2.5] iti darśitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:840: 'pañcīkṛta-pañca-mahā-bhūta-tat-kāryātmako hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sūtram amūrta-rāśiḥ sūkṣma-samaṣṭiḥ trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma [BAU 1.6.1]
GE07bhg4c02u:851: te ca sarva ekasyaivātmanaḥ śarīrāṇīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:852: tasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā yaḥ pūrvasya
GE07bhg4c02u:854: tasya prāṇa-mayasyaiṣa eva śarīre bhavaḥ śārīra ātmā yaḥ satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇo guhā-nihitatvenoktaḥ pūrvasyānna-mayasya |
GE07bhg4c02u:864: iti sarva-śarīra-sambandhinam ekam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ darśayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:865: nanu nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ tathā cāvidyādivat kālena saha nāśe 'pi tad-upapannam ity ata āha anāśina iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:868: yāvad-vikāraṃ tu vibhāgo lokavat [Vs 2.3.7] iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:869: ātmanas tu pariccheda-traya-śūnyasyākalpitasya vināśa-hetv-abhāvān mukhyam eva kūṭastha-nityatvaṃ na tu pariṇāmi-nityatvaṃ yāvat-kāla-sthāyitvaṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:870: nanv etādṛśe dehini kiṃcit pramāṇam avaśyaṃ vācyam anyathā niṣpramāṇasya tasyālīkatvāpatteḥ śāstrārambha-vaiyarthyāpatteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:871: tathā ca vastu-paricchedo duṣpariharaḥ śāstra-yonitvāt [Vs 1.1.3] iti nyāyāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:875: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:878: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [ṃuṇḍU 2.2.10]
GE07bhg4c02u:879: iti ca śruteḥ sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpa evātmātas tasya sarva-bhāsakasya
GE07bhg4c02u:884: tathā ca sarva-kalpita-nivartaka-vṛtti-viśeṣotpatty-arthaṃ śāstrārambhaḥ, tasya tattvam asy ādi-vākya-mātrādhīnatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:885: svataḥ sarvadābhāsamānatvāt sarva-kalpanādhiṣṭhānatvād dṛśyamātra-bhāsakatvāc ca na tasya
GE07bhg4c02u:887: tathā caikam evādvitīyaṃ satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmety
GE07bhg4c02u:888: ādi-śāstram eva sva-prameyānurodhena svasyāpi kalpitatvam āpādayati
GE07bhg4c02u:891: ātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvaṃ ca yuktito 'pi bhagavat-pūjyapādair upapāditam |
GE07bhg4c02u:893: yatra jijñāsoḥ saṃśaya-viparyaya-vyatireka-pramāṇānām anyatamam api nāsti
GE07bhg4c02u:894: tatra tad-virodhi jñānam iti sarvatra dṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c02u:896: ātmani cāhaṃ vā nāhaṃ veti na kasyacit saṃśayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:897: nāpi nāham iti viparyayo vyatirekaḥ pramā veti tat-svarūpa-pramā
GE07bhg4c02u:899: dharmyaśe sarvam abhrāntaṃ prakāre tu viparyayaḥ iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:901: pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ ca pramābhāsas tathaiva ca |
