GE07bhg4c02u:904: sva-prakāśe sad-rūpe dharmiṇi pramāṇāpramāṇayor viśeṣo nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:905: ātmano 'bhāsamānatve ca ghaṭa-jñānaṃ mayi jātaṃ na
GE07bhg4c02u:909: bāhya-padārthe k ptena virodhi-jñānenaiva saṃśayādi-pratibandha-saṃbhava āntara-padārthe
GE07bhg4c02u:914: hetutvād ghaṭādi-bhāne 'py ātma-bhānaṃ samūhālambana-nyāyena tārkikāṇāṃ pravareṇāpi durnivāraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:920: na ca vyavasāya-bhānārthaṃ sa tasya dīpavat sva-vyavahāre sajātīyānapekṣatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:921: na hi ghaṭa-taj-jñānayor iva vyavasāyānuvyavasāyayor api
GE07bhg4c02u:925_0: nanu yathā ghaṭa-vyavahārārthaṃ ghaṭa-jñānam abhyupeyate tathā ghaṭa-jñāna-vyavahārārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:925_2: iti cet kānupapattir udbhāvitā devānāṃ-priyeṇa sva-prakāśa-vādinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:929: tathā ceśvara-jñānavadyogi-jñānavat prameyam iti jñānavac ca svenaiva sva-vyavahāropapattau na jñānāntara-kalpanāvakāśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:934: hetutāyāḥ k ptatvāt tenaiva rūpeṇa ghata-jñāna-vyavahāre,pi hetutopapattau na ghaṭa-jñāna-jñānatvaṃ hetutāvacchedakaṃ gauravān mānābhāvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:935: tathā ca nānuvyavasāya-siddhir ekasyaiva vyavasāyasya vayvasātari vyavaseye vyavasāye ca vyavahāra-janakatvopapatter iti tripuṭī-pratyakṣa-vādinaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:937: aupaniṣadāstu manyante sva-prakāśa-jñāna-rūpa evātmā na svaprakāśa-jñānāśrayaḥ kartṛ-karma-virodhena tad-bhānānupapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:943: sa cakṣur-ādi-dvārāntaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmena ghaṭādīn vyāpya tad-ākāro bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:948: antaḥ-karaṇa-pariṇāmaś ca vṛttyākhyo 'tisvacchaḥ svāvacchinnenaiva caitanyena bhāsyata
GE07bhg4c02u:950: tad etad ākāra-trayam ahaṃ jānāmi ghaṭam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:952: antaḥkaraṇa-tad-vṛttīḥ prati tu vṛtty-anapekṣatvāt sākṣiteti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:954_0: yasmād evaṃ prāg-ukta-nyāyena ntiyo vibhur asaṃsārī sarvadaika-rūpaś cātmā tasmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:954_1: tan-nāśa-śaṅkayā svadharme yuddhe prāk-pravṛttasya tava tasmād uparatir na yukteti
GE07bhg4c02u:954_2: yuddhābhyanujñayā bhagavān āha - tasmād yudhyasva bhārateti |
GE07bhg4c02u:955: arjunasya svadharme yuddhe pravṛttasya tata uparati-kāraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:957: tau ca vicāra-janitena vijñānena vādhitāv ity apavādāpavāda utsargasya sthitir iti nyāyena yudhyasvety anuvādo na vidhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:962: akākārayoḥ strī-pratyayayoḥ prayoge neti vaktavyam iti tad-apavādaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:963: tathā ca mumukṣor brahmaṇor jijñāsety atrāpavādāpavāde punar utsarga-sthiteḥ kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛtīty anenaiva ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c02u:964: tathā ca karmaṇi ceti niṣedhā-prasārād brahma-jijñāseti
GE07bhg4c02u:966: kaścit tv etasmād eva vidher mokṣe
GE07bhg4c02u:968: tac ca yudhyasvety ato mokṣasya jñāna-karma-samuccaya-sādhyatvāpratīteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:971: viśvanāthaḥ : nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati antavanta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:973: tasmād yudhyasva iti śāstra-vihitasya svadharmasya tyāgo 'nucita iti bhāvaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c02u:975: aprameyasyātisūkṣmatvād vijñāna-vijñātṛ-svarūpatvāc ca pramātum aśakyasyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:977: śoka-sthānam iti jīvātmano deho dharmānuṣṭānuṣṭhāna-dvārā tasya bhogāya mokṣāya ca pareśena sṛjyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:978: sa ca sa ca dharmeṇa bhavet tasmād yudhyasva bhārata ||18||
GE07bhg4c02u:980: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam |
GE07bhg4c02u:981: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate ||19||
GE07bhg4c02u:982_0: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ bhīṣmādi-mṛtyu-nimittaḥ śoko nivāritaḥ, yac cātmano hantṛtva-nimittaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:982_1: duḥkham uktam etān na hantum icchāmi ity ādinā, tad api tavad eva nirnimittam ity
GE07bhg4c02u:985: hanana-kriyāyāḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvam api nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:987: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv evam aśocyān anvaśocacas tvam ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:990: nahi yatra śoko nāsti tatra pāpaṃ nāstīti niyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:993: ato 'haṃ kartā tvaṃ preraka iti dvayor api
GE07bhg4c02u:994: hiṃsā-nimitta-pātakāpatter ayuktam idaṃ vacanaṃ tasmād yudhyasva bhāratety
GE07bhg4c02u:995: āśaṅkya kāṭhaka-paṭhitaya rcā pariharati bhagavān ya enam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:996: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam adṛśyatvādi-guṇakaṃ yo hantāraṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:997: kartāraṃ vetti aham asya hanteti vijānāti |
GE07bhg4c02u:998: yaś cānya enaṃ manyate hataṃ hanana-kriyāyāḥ karma-bhūtaṃ deha-hananena hato 'ham iti vijānāti
GE07bhg4c02u:999: tāv ubhau dehābhimānitvād enam avikāriṇam akāraka-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ na vijānīto na vivekena jānītaḥ śāstrāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1000: kasmāt yasmān nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate kartā karma ca na bahvatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1001: atra ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ hataṃ cety etāvati vaktavye padānām āvṛttir vākyālaṅkārārthā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1002: athavā ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ tārkikādir ātmanaḥ kartṛtvābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1003: tathā yaś cainaṃ manyate hataṃ cārvākādir ātmano vināśitvābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1004: tāv ubhau na vijānīta iti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1008: hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU
GE07bhg4c02u:1010: viśvanāthaḥ : bho vayasya arjuna ! tvam ātmā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1011: na hanteḥ kartā, nāpi hanteḥ karma ity āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1012: enaṃ jīvātmānaṃ hantāraṃ vetti bhīṣmādīn arjuno hantīti yo vettīty arthaḥ, hatam iti bhīṣmādibhir arjuno hanyate iti yo vetti, tāv ubhāv apy ajñāninau |
GE07bhg4c02u:1014: ajñāni-loka-gītād duryaśaḥ kā te bhītir iti bhāvaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c02u:1016: enam ukta-svabhāvam ātmānaṃ jīvaṃ yo hantāraṃ khaḍgādinā hiṃsakaṃ vetti yaś cainaṃ tena hataṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1017: manyate tāv ubhau tat-svarūpaṃ na vijānītaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1018: atisūkṣmasya caitanyasya tasya chedādy-asambhavān nāyam ātmā hanti na hanyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1019: hanteḥ kartā karma ca bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1022: śrutiś caivam āha - hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam [KaṭhU 1.2.19] ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:1025: na cātrātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ prasiddham iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1028: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1029: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:1030: śrīdharaḥ : na hanyata ity etad eva ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-śūnyatvena draḍhayati neti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1035: na cāyaṃ bhūtvā utpadya bhavitā bhavati astitvaṃ bhajate, kintu prāg eva svataḥ sad-rūpa iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1038: yo hi na jāyate sa hi janmāntaram astitvaṃ bhajate, na tu yaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1039: svayam evāsti sa bhūyo 'pi anyad astitvaṃ bhajate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1045: purāpi nava eva na tu pariṇāmataḥ rūpāntaraṃ prāpya navo bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1046: yad vā na bhavitety asyānuṣaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhaviteti tathā
GE07bhg4c02u:1050: tad evaṃ jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyaty evaṃ yāskādibhir veda-vādibhir uktāḥ ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā
GE07bhg4c02u:1052: yad artham ete vikārā nirastās taṃ prastutaṃ vināśābhāvam upasaṃharati na hanyate hanyamāne śarīra iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:1053: madhusūdanaḥ : kasmād ayam ātmā hanana-kriyāyāḥ kartā karma ca na bhavati ? avikriyatvād ity āha dvitīyena mantreṇa |
GE07bhg4c02u:1054: jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate 'pakṣīyate vinaśyatīti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārā iti vārṣyāyaṇiḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1056: tatrādy-antayor niṣedhaḥ kriyate na jāyate mriyate veti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1058: na jāyate na mriyate cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1059: kasmād ayam ātmā notpadyate ? yasmād ayam ātmā kadācit kasminn api kāle na bhūtvābhūtvā prāg bhūyaḥ punar api bhavitā na |
GE07bhg4c02u:1060: yo hy abhūtvā bhavati sa utpatti-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1061: ayaṃ tu prāg api sattvādyato notpadyate 'to 'jaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1062: tathāyam ātmā bhūtvā prāk kadācid bhūyaḥ punar na bhavitā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1065: na bhavati sa mṛt-lakṣaṇāṃ vikriyām anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1067: sattvādyato na miryate 'to nityo vināśāyogya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1068: atra na bhūtvety atra samāsābhāve 'pi nānupapattir nānuyojeṣv ativat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1073: tad uktam ācārya-śavara-svāminā - asad-vādī hi kātyāyanaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1074: atra na jāyate mriyate veti pratijñā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1075: kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūya iti tad-upapādanam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1076: ajo nitya iti tad-upasaṃhāra iti vibhāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1077: ādyantayor vikārayor niṣedhena madhyavarti-vikārāṇāṃ tad-vyāpyānāṃ niṣedhe jāte 'pi gamanādi-vikārāṇām anuktānām apy upalakṣaṇāyāpakṣayaś ca vṛddhiś ca sva-śabdenaiva nirākriyete |
GE07bhg4c02u:1078: tatra kūṭastha-nityatvād ātmano nirguṇatvāc ca na svarūpato guṇato vāpakṣayaḥ sambhavatīty uktaṃ śāśvata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1079: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpacīyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1080: yadi nāpakṣīyate tarhi vardhatām iti nety āha purāṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1082: na tv adhunā nūtanāṃ kāñcid avasthām anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1083: yo hi nūtanāṃ kāñcid upacayāvasthām anubhavati sa vardhata ity ucyate loke |
GE07bhg4c02u:1084: ayaṃ tu sarvadaika-rūpatvān nāpacīyate nopacīyate cety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1085: astitva-vipariṇāmau tu janma-vināśāntarbhūtatvāt pṛthaṅ na niṣiddhau |
GE07bhg4c02u:1086: yasmād evaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnya ātmā tasmāc charīre hanyamāne tat-sambaddho
GE07bhg4c02u:1087: 'pi kenāpy upāyena na hanyate na hantuṃ śakyata ity upasaṃhāraḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:1088: viśvanāthaḥ : jīvātmano nityatvaṃ spaṣṭatayā sādhayati na jāyate miryate iti janma-maraṇayor vartamānatva-niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1089: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā iti tayor bhūtatva-bhaviṣyatva-niṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1090: ataeva aja iti kāla-traye 'pi ajasya janmābhāvān nāsya prāg-abhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1091: śāśvataḥ śaśvat sarva-kāla eva vartata iti nāsya kāla-traye 'pi dhvaṃsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1095: purāṇaḥ purāpi navaḥ prācīno 'py ayaṃ navīna iveti ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikārābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1096: nanu śarīrasya maraṇād aupacārikaṃ tu maraṇam asyāstu ? tatrāha neti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1098: baladevaḥ : atha jāyate asti vardhate viparaṇamate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti yāskādy-ukta-ṣaḍ-bhāva-vikāra-rāhityena prāg-ukta-nityatvaṃ draḍhayati na jāyate iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1100: ayam ātmā jīvaḥ kadācid api kāle na jāyate na mriyate ceti janma-vināśayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1101: na cāyam ātmā bhūtvotpadya bhavitā bhaviṣyatīti janmāntarasyāstitvasya pratiṣedhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1102: na bhūya iti ayam ātmā bhūyo 'dhikaṃ yathā syāt tathā na bhavatīti buddheḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1104: kuto bhūyo na bhavatīty atra hetur ajo nitya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1105: utpatti-vināśa-yogī khalu vṛkṣādir utpadya vṛddhiṃ gacchan naṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1106: ātmanas tu tad-ubhayābhāvāt na vṛddhir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1108: śaśvat sarvadā bhavati nāpakṣīyate nāpakṣayaṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1110: purāṇaṃ purāpi navo na tu kiṃcin nūtanaṃ rūpāntaram adhunā na labdha ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1112: yasmād īdṛśas tasmāc charīre hanyamāne 'pi sa na hanyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1113: tathā cārjuno 'yaṃ guru-hantety avijñoktyā duṣkīrter abibhyatā tvayā śāstrīyaṃ dharma-yuddhaṃ vidheyam ||20||
GE07bhg4c02u:1115: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1116: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:1117: śrīdharaḥ : ataeva hantṛtvābhāvo 'pi pūrvoktaḥ prasiddha ity āha vedāvināśinam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1121: yo veda sa puruṣaḥ kaṃ hanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1124: tathā svayaṃ prayojako bhūtvānyena kaṃ ghātayati ? kathaṃ vā ghātayati ? na kiñcid api |
GE07bhg4c02u:1126: anena mayy api prayojakatvād doṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ mā kārṣīr ity uktaṃ bhavati ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:1127: madhusūdanaḥ : nāyaṃ hanti na hanyata iti pratijñāya na hanyata ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1128: upapāditam idānīṃ na hantīty upapādayann upasaṃharati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1129: na vinaṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tam avināśinam antya-vikāra-rahitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1130: tatra hetuḥ - avyayaṃ na vidyate vyayo 'vayavāpacayo guṇāpacayo vā yasya tam avyayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1131: avayavāpacayena guṇāpacayena vā vināśa-darśanāt tad-ubhaya-rahitasya na vināśaḥ sambhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1132: nanu janyatvena vināśitvam anumāsyāmahe nety āha - ajam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1135: prāg-avidyamānasya hi janma dṛṣṭaṃ na tu sarvatā sata ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1141: evaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaṃ prakṛtam enaṃ dehinaṃ svam ātmānaṃ yo veda vijānāti śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ sākṣātkaroti ahaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1142: sarva-bhāsakaḥ sarva-dvaita-rahitaḥ paramānanda-bodha-rūpa iti sa evaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1143: vidvān puruṣaḥ pūrṇa-rūpaḥ kaṃ hanti ? kathaṃ hanti ? kiṃ-śabda ākṣepe |
GE07bhg4c02u:1144: na kam api hanti na katham api hantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1145: tathā kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ ghātayati kam api na ghātayati katham api na ghātayatīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1149: ātmānaṃ ced vijānīyād ayam asmīti pūruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1150: kim icchan kasya kāmāya śarīram anusaṃjvaret || [BAU 4.4.12]
GE07bhg4c02u:1154: vastu-gatyā ko 'pi nakaroti na kārayati ca kiṃcit sarva-vikriyā-śūnya-svabhāvatvāt paraṃ tu svapna ivāvidyayā kartṛtvādikam ātmany abhimanyate mūḍhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1155: tad uktam ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1157: śrutiś ca - dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva [BAU 4.3.7] ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1159: vidvāṃs tu samūlādhyāsa-bādhān nātmani kartṛtvādikam abhimanyate sthāṇu-svarūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1161: ato vikriyā-rahitatvād advitīyatvāc ca vidvān na karoti kārayati cety ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1162: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- vidvān na bibheti
GE07bhg4c02u:1164: arjuno hi svasmin kartṛtvaṃ bhagavati ca kārayitṛtvam adhyasya hiṃsā-nimittaṃ doṣam ubhayatrāpy āśaśaṅke |
GE07bhg4c02u:1165: bhagavān api viditābhiprāyo hanti ghātayatīti tad-ubhayam ācikṣepa |
GE07bhg4c02u:1166: ātmani kartṛtvaṃ mayi ca kārayitṛtvam āropya pratyavāya-śaṅkāṃ mā kārṣīr ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1171: tathā ca vakṣyati tasya kāryaṃ na vidyata [Gītā 3.17] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1175: tasmād yudhyasvety atra hananasya bhagavatābhyanujñānād vāstava-kartṛtvādy-abhāvasya karma-mātre samatvād iti dik ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:1176: viśvanāthaḥ : ata evambhūta-jñāne sati tvaṃ yudhyamāno 'pi ahaṃ yuddhe prerayann api doṣa-bhājau naiva bhavāva ity āha vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1178: avināśinam iti, ajam iti, avyayam ity etair vināśa-janyā
GE07bhg4c02u:1180: sa puruṣo mal-lakṣaṇaḥ kaṃ ghātayati, kathaṃ vā ghātayati, sa puruṣas tval-lakṣaṇaḥ kaṃ hanti ? kathaṃ vā hanti ? ||21||
GE07bhg4c02u:1181: baladevaḥ : evaṃ tattva-jñānavān yo dharma-buddhyā yuddhe pravartate yaś
GE07bhg4c02u:1182: ca pravartayati, tasya tasya ca ko 'pi na doṣa-gandha ity āha vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1183: enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānam avināśinam ajam avyayam apakṣaya-śūnyaṃ ca yo veda
GE07bhg4c02u:1184: śāstra-yuktibhyāṃ jānāti, sa puruṣo yuddhe pravṛtto 'pi kaṃ hanti kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1185: vā hanti ? tatra pravartayann api kaṃ ghātayati kathaṃ vā ghātayati ? kim ākṣepe - na kam api na katham apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1188: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1189: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1190: śrīdharaḥ : nanv ātmano 'vināśe 'pi tadīya-śarīra-nāśaṃ paryālocya śocāmīiti cet ? tatrāha vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1191: karmaṇi bandhanānāṃ nūtanānāṃ dehānām avaśyambhāvitvāt na taj-jīrṇa-deha-nāśe śokāvakāśa ity arthaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1192: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv evam ātmano vināśitvābhāve 'pi dehānāṃ vināśitvād yuddhasya ca tan-nāśakatvāt kathaṃ bhīṣmādi-dehānām
GE07bhg4c02u:1193: aneka-sukṛta-sādhanānāṃ mayā yuddhena vināśaḥ kārya ity āśaṅkāyā uttaram vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1194: jīrṇāni vihāya vastrāṇi navāni gṛhṇāti vikriyā-śūnya eva naro yathety
GE07bhg4c02u:1196: tena yathā nikṛṣṭāni vastrāṇi vihāyotkṛṣṭāni jano gṛhṇātīty aucityāyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1197: tathā jīrṇāni vayasā tapasā ca kṛśāni bhīṣmādi-śarīrāṇi vihāyānyāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1199: samyag-garbha-vāsādi-kleśa-vyatirekeṇa prāpnoti dehī prakṛṣṭa-dharmānuṣṭhātṛ-dehavān bhīṣmādir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1200: anyan navataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ kurute pitryaṃ vā gandharvaṃ vā daivaṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā brāhmaṃ vā ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1201: etad uktaṃ bhavati bhīṣmādayo hi yāvaj jīvaṃ dharmānuṣṭhāna-kleśenaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:1202: jarjara-śarīrā vartamāna-śarīra-pātam antareṇa tat-phala-bhogāyāsam arthā yadi dharma-yuddhena svarga-pratibandhakāni jarjarāṇi śarīrāṇi pātayitvā
GE07bhg4c02u:1212: ātmanaḥ kriyata iti tu prācāṃ vyākhyānam atispaṣṭam ||22||
GE07bhg4c02u:1213: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu madīya-yuddhād bhīṣma-saṃjñakaṃ śarīraṃ tu jīvātmā
GE07bhg4c02u:1214: tyakṣyaty eva ity atas tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca tatra hetu bhavāva eva ity ata āha vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1215: navīnaṃ vastraṃ paridhāpayituṃ jīrṇa-vastrasya tyajane kaścit kiṃ doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1217: parityajya divyaṃ navyaṃ anyac charīraṃ prāpsyatīti kas tava vā mama vā doṣo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1218: baladevaḥ : nanu mā bhūd ātmanāṃ vināśo bhīṣmādi-saṃjñānāṃ tac-charīrāṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1219: tat-sukha-sādhanānāṃ yuddhena vināśe tat-sukha-viccheda-hetuko doṣaḥ syād eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1220: anyathā prāyaścitta-śāstrāṇi nirviṣayāṇi syur iti cet tatrāha vāsāṃsīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1224: tad ubhayaṃ ca yuddhenaiva kṣipraṃ bhaved ity upakārakāt tasmān mā viraṃsīr iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1225: saṃyātīti samyag-garbha-vāsādi-yātanāṃ vinaiva śīghram eva prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1229: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1230: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c02u:1231: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ hantīti anena uktaṃ vadha-sādhanābhāvaṃ darśayann avināśitvam ātmanaḥ sphuṭīkaroti nainam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1232: āpo kledayanti mṛdu-karaṇena śithilaṃ na kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1235: viśvanāthaḥ : na ca yuddhe tvayā prayuktebhyaḥ śastrāstrebhyaḥ kāpy ātmano vyathā sambhaved ity āha nainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1241: vināśaḥ syāt gṛha-dāhe tan-madhya-sthasyaiva jantor iti cet tatrāha nainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1246: tathā ca tat-prayuktaiḥ śastrāstrair nātmanaḥ kācid
GE07bhg4c02u:1251: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha acchedya ity ādinā sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:1266: yato 'śoṣyo 'yam ato nainaṃ śoṣayati māruta iti krameṇa yojanīyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1275: ayaṃ tu sarva-gato vibhur ato nitya eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1277: yadi cāyaṃ vikārī syāt tadā sarva-gato na syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1281: yadi cāyaṃ calaḥ kriyāvān syāt tadā vikārī syād ghaṭādivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1288: sarvadaika-rūpo na kasyā api kriyāyāḥ karmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1292: sarvagatatvān na prāpyaḥ paricchinnasyaiva paya-ādeḥ prāpyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1297: ākāśavat sarva-gataś ca nityaḥ [ChāU 3.14.3], vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ [ŚvetU 3.9], niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ [ŚvetU 6.19], ity ādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1298_0: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yo 'psu tiṣṭhann adbhyo 'ntaro yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs
GE07bhg4c02u:1298_1: tejaso 'ntaro yo vāyau tiṣṭan vāyor antaraḥ [BAU 3.7.3 ff] ity ādyā ca śrutiḥ sarvagatasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1300: yo hi śastrādau na tiṣṭhati taṃ śastrādayaś chindanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1303: ataḥ katham enaṃ śastrādīni sva-vyāpāra-viṣayī kuryur ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1304: atra yena sūryas tapati tejaseddhaḥ [Taitt. Br. 3.12.97] ity ādi śrutayo 'nusandheyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1307: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmād ātmāyam evam ucyata ity āha acchedya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1308: atra prakaraṇe jīvātmano nityatvasya śabdato 'rthataś ca paunaruktyaṃ nirdhāraṇa-prayojakaṃ sandigdhadhīṣu jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1310: 'sti dharmo 'stīti tri-caturdhā-prayogād dharmo 'sty eveti niḥsaṃśayā pratītiḥ syād iti jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1319: baladevaḥ : chedādy-abhāvād eva tat-tan-nāmabhir ayam ākhyāyata ity āha acchedyo 'yam iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1322: sva-karma-hetukeṣu deva-mānavādiṣu paśu-pakṣy-ādiṣu ca sarveṣu śarīreṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:1327: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā [Bau 4.5.14] iti śruter ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1328: na cānucchittir eva dharmo yasyeti vyākhyeyaṃ tasyārthasyāvināśīty anenaiva lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1329: tasmād anucchittayo nityā dharmā yasya sa tathety evārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1330: sanātanaḥ śāśvataḥ paunarukta-doṣas tv agre parihariṣyate ||24||
GE07bhg4c02u:1337: avikāryaḥ karmendriyāṇām apy agocara ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1340: tad evam ātmano janma-vināśābhāvān na śokaḥ kārya ity uktam ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1341: madhusūdanaḥ : chedyatvādi-grāhaka-pramāṇa-bhāvād api tad-abhāva ity āha -
GE07bhg4c02u:1346: ato na pratyakṣaṃ tatra cchedyatvādi-grāhakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1347: pratyakṣābhāve 'py anumānaṃ syād ity ata āha acintyo 'yaṃ cintyo 'numeyas
GE07bhg4c02u:1351: apratyakṣe tu vyāpti-grahaṇāsambhavān nānumeyatvam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1352_0: apratyakṣasyāpīndriyādeḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumāna-viṣayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam ata āha avikāryo
GE07bhg4c02u:1352_1: 'yaṃ yad vikriyāvac cakṣur-ādikaṃ tat-svakāryānyathānupapattyā kalpyamānam arthāpatteḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1353: ayaṃ tu na vikāryo na vikriyāvān ato nārthāpatteḥ sāmānyato-dṛṣṭasya vā viṣaya ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1355: nanu vedenaiva tatra ccehdyatvādi grahīṣyata ity ata āha - ucyate vedena sopakaraṇenācchedyāvyaktādi-rūpa evāyam ucyate tātparyeṇa pratipādyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1356: ato na vedasya tat-pratipādikasyāpi cchedyatvādi-pratipādakatvam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1357: atra nainaṃ chindanti [Gītā 2.23] ity atra śastrādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1361: avyakto 'yam ity atra tac-chedādi-grāhaka-mānābhāva ukta ity apaunaruktyaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1362: vedāvināśinam ity ādīnāṃ tu ślokānām arthataḥ śabdataś ca paunaruktyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1364: durbodhatvād ātma-vastunaḥ punaḥ punaḥ prasaṅgam āpādya śabdāntareṇa tad eva vastu nirūpayati bhagavān vāsudevaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1365: kathaṃ nu nāma saṃsāriṇām buddhi-gocaratām āpannaṃ tattvaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttaye syāt iti [Śaṅkara-bhāṣya 2.24] iti vadadbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1366: evaṃ pūrvokta-yuktibhir ātmano nityatve nirvikāratve ca siddhe tava śoko nopapanna ity upasaṃharati tasmād ity ardhena |
GE07bhg4c02u:1369: tenātmānam aviditvā yad anvaśocas tad yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1370: ātmānaṃ viditvā tu nānuśocitum arhasīty abhiprāyaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1376: atra avināśi tu tad viddhi ity ādibhir
GE07bhg4c02u:1377: ātma-tattvam upadiśan hariḥ śabdato 'rthataś ca yat punaḥ punar avocat tasya durbodhasya saubodhyārtham evety adoṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1379: ayaṃ dharmaṃ vettīty uktau tad vedanaṃ niścitaṃ yathā syāt tadvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1380: evam evāgre vakṣyati āścaryavat paśyati kaścit ity ādinā ||25||
GE07bhg4c02u:1382: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1383: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1384: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ dehena saha ātmano janma tad-vināśena ca vināśam aṅgīkṛtyāpi śoko na kārya ity āha atha cainam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1385: atha ca yadyapy enam ātmānam nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho naivaṃ śocitum arhasi ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1386: madhusūdanaḥ : evam ātmano nirvikāratvenāśocyatvam uktam idānīṃ vikāravattvam abhyupetyāpi śloka-dvayenāśocyatvaṃ pratipādayati bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:1388: deha evātmā sa ca sthiro 'py anukṣaṇa-pariṇāmī jāyate naśyati ceti pratyakṣa-siddham evaitad iti lokāyatikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1389: dehātirikto 'pi dehena sahaiva jāyate naśyati cety anye
GE07bhg4c02u:1392: nitya evātmā jāyate mriyate ceti tārkikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1400: anityasya tu kṛta-hānya-kṛtābhyāgama-prasaṅgena dharmādharmādhāratvānupapatter na janma-maraṇe mukhye iti vadanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1402: tatrānityatva-pakṣe 'pi śocyatvam ātmano niṣedhati atha cainam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1409: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ jātaṃ nityaṃ mṛtaṃ vā manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1411: kṣaṇikatva-pakṣe nityaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ pakṣāntare āvaśyakatvān nityaṃ niyataṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1412: jāto 'yaṃ mṛto 'yam iti laukika-pratyaya-vaśena yadi kalpayasi tathāpi he mahābāho ! puruṣa-dhaureyeti sopahāsaṃ kumatābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1413: tvayy etādṛśī kudṛṣṭir na sambhavatīti sānukampaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1414: evaṃ aha bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam [Gītā 1.45] ity ādi yathā śocasi evaṃ prakāram anuśokaṃ kartuṃ svayam api tvaṃ tādṛśa eva san nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1415: kṣaṇikatva-pakṣe dehātma-vāda-pakṣe dehena saha janma-vināśa-pakṣe ca janmāntarābhāvena pāpa-bhayāsambhavāt pāpa-bhayenaiva khalu tvam anuśocasi
GE07bhg4c02u:1416: | tac caitādṛśe darśane na sambhavati bandhu-vināśa-darśitvābhāvād ity adhikaṃ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1418: | dṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitta-śoka-sambhave 'py adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śokaḥ sarvathā nocita ity arthaḥ prathama-ślokasya ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1419: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ śāstrīya-tattva-dṛṣṭyā tvām ahaṃ prabodhayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1421: nitya-jātaṃ dehe jāte saty enaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ jātaṃ manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1422: tathā deha eva mṛte mṛtaṃ nityaṃ niyataṃ manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1423: mahā-bāho iti parākramavataḥ kṣatriyasya tava tad api yuddham avaśyakaṃ svadharmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1426: bhrātāpi bhrātaraṃ hanyād yena ghorataras tataḥ || iti bhāvaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c02u:1427: baladevaḥ : evaṃ svoktasya jīvātmano 'śocyatvam uktvā paroktasyāpi tasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1429: tad-abhijñaḥ khalu śiṣyas tad-avakarais tan nirasya vijayī san sva-mate sthairyam āsīt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1431: bhūmy-ādi-bhūta-catuṣṭaye tāmbūla-rāgavat mada-śaktivac ca caitanyam utpadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1434: pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmād utpatti-vināśa-yogīti loka-pratyakṣa-siddham iti lokāyatikā manyante
GE07bhg4c02u:1442: ālambase, tatra dehātma-pakṣe enaṃ deha-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ nityaṃ vā mṛtaṃ manyase |
GE07bhg4c02u:1444: tathāpi tvam enaṃ aho bata mahat pāpaṃ ity ādi-vacanaiḥ śocituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1447: he mahābāho iti sopahāsaṃ sambodhanaṃ kṣatriya-varyasya vaidikasya ca te
GE07bhg4c02u:1450: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1451: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1452: śrīdharaḥ : kuta iti ? ata āha jātasyety-ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1455: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1457: avaśyambhāvini janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocitum nārhasi yogyo na bhavasi ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1459: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-duḥkha-sambhavāt tad-bhayena śocāmīty ata āha dvitīya-ślokena
GE07bhg4c02u:1464: tathā dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca prāg-deha-kṛta-karma-phalopabhogārthaṃ sānuśayasyaiva prastutatvān
GE07bhg4c02u:1467: janma-maraṇa-lakṣaṇe 'rthe viṣaye tvam evaṃ vidvān na śocitum arhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1468: tathā ca vakṣyati ṛte 'pi tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti sarve [Gītā 11.32] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1469: yadi hi tvayā yuddhe 'nāhanyamānā ete jīveyur eva tadā yuddhāya śokas
GE07bhg4c02u:1471: ete tu karma-kṣayāt svayam eva mriyanta iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1472: tat-parihārāsamarthasya tava dṛṣṭ-duḥkha-nimittaḥ śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1473: evam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nimitte 'pi śoke tasmād aparihārye 'rthe ity evottaram |
GE07bhg4c02u:1474: yuddhākhyaṃ hi karma kṣatriyasya niyatam agnihotrādivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1475: tac ca yudha samprahāre ity asmād dhātor niṣpannaṃ śatru-prāṇa-viyogānukūla-śastra-prahāra-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1477: tathā ca gautamaḥ smarati na doṣo hiṃsāyām āhave 'nyatra
GE07bhg4c02u:1482: etac ca sarvaṃ svadharmam api cāvekṣyety atra spaṣṭīkariṣyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1483: tathā ca yuddha-lakṣaṇe 'rthe 'gnihotrādivad vihitatvād aparihārye parihartum aśakye tad-akaraṇe pratyavāya-prasaṅgāt tvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1485: yadi tu yuddhākhyaṃ karma kāmyam eva -
GE07bhg4c02u:1487: akūṭair āyudhair yānti te svargaṃ yogino yathā || [Yajñ. 13.324]
GE07bhg4c02u:1489: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1493: athavātma-nityatva-pakṣa eva śloka-dvayam arjunasya paramāstikasya veda-bāhya-matābhyupagamāsambhavāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1495: dehendriyādi-sambandha-vaśāj jātaś ceti nitya-jātas tam enam ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1496: nityam api santaṃ jātaṃ cen manyase tathā nityam api santaṃ mṛtaṃ cen manyase tathāpi tvaṃ nānuśocitum arhasīti hetum āha jātasya hīty ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1500: viśvanāthaḥ : hi yasmāt tasya svārambhaka-karma-kṣaye mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1501: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1502: aparihārye 'rthe iti mṛtyur janma ca parihartum a]cakyam eva ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1513: jātasya sva-karma-vaśāt prāpta-śarīrādi-yogasya nityasyāpy ātmanas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-hetuko mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1516: tasmād evam aparihārye parihartum aśakye janma-maraṇātmake 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocituṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1518: tvayi yuddhān nivṛtte 'py ete svārambhake karmaṇi kṣīṇe sati mariṣyanty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1519: tava tu svadharmād vicyutir bhāvinīti bhāvaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c02u:1523: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca dehānāṃ svabhāvaṃ paryālocya tad-upādhike ātmano
GE07bhg4c02u:1527: tad eva ādir utpatteḥ pūrva-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyaktādīni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1530: tathā vyaktam abhivyaktaṃ madhyaṃ janma-maraṇāntarālaṃ sthiti-lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni vyakta-madhyāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1531: avyakte nidhanaṃ layo yeṣāṃ tānīmāny evaṃ-bhūtāny eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1532: tatra teṣu kā paridevanā ? kaḥ śoka-nimitto vilāpaḥ ? pratibuddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1533: svapna-dṛṣṭa-vastuṣv iva śoko na yujyata ity arthaḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1534_0: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇātmano 'śocyatvam upapāditam athedānīm ātmano
GE07bhg4c02u:1534_1: 'śocyatve 'pi bhūta-saṅghātātmakāni śarīrāṇy uddiśya śocāmīty arjunāśaṅkām apanudati
GE07bhg4c02u:1534_2: bhagavān avyaktādīnīti ādau janmanaḥ prāg-avyaktāni anupalabdhāni bhūtāni pṛthivyādi-bhūta-mayāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1534_3: śarīrāṇi madhye janmānantaraṃ maraṇāt prāg-vyaktāni upalabdhāni santi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1536: yathā svapnendrajālādau pratibhāsa-mātra-jīvanāni śukti-rūpyādivan na tu jñānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1538: tathā ca - ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā [ṃā. Kā. 2.6] iti nyāyena madhye 'pi na santy evaitāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1539: nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ [Gītā 2.16] iti prāg-ukteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1540: evaṃ sati tatra teṣu mithyā-bhūteṣv atyanta-tuccheṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevanā
GE07bhg4c02u:1541: ko vā duḥkha-pralāpo na ko 'py ucita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1542: na hi svapne vividhān bandhūn upalabhya pratibuddhas tad-vicchedena śocati pṛthag-jano 'pi etad evoktaṃ purāṇe adarśanād āpatitaḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gataḥ bhūta-saṅgha iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1543: tathā ca śarīrāṇy apy uddiśya śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1545: avyaktam avyākṛtam avidyopahita-caitanyam ādiḥ prāg avasthā yeṣāṃ tāni tathā vyaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1546: nāma-rūpābhyām evāvidyakābhyāṃ prakaṭībhūtaṃ na tu svena paramārtha-sadātmanā madhyaṃ sthity-avasthā yeṣāṃ tādṛśāni bhūtāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1547: ākāśādīni avyakta-nidhanāny evāvyakte sva-kāraṇe mṛd iva ghaṭādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1548: nidhanaṃ pralayo yeṣāṃ teṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevaneti pūrvavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1549: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad dhedaṃ tarhy avyākṛtam āsīt tan-nāma-rūpābhyām eva vyākriyata [BAU 1.4.7] ity ādir avyaktopādānatāṃ sarvasya prapañcasya darśayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1550: laya-sthānatvaṃ tu tasyārtha-siddhaṃ kāraṇa eva kārya-layasya darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1553: ākāśādi-bhūtāny apy uddiśya śoko nocitaś cet tat-kāryāṇy uddiśya nocita iti kim u vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1554: athavā sarvadā teṣām avyakta-rūpeṇa vidyamānatvād vicchedābhāvena tan-nimittaḥ pralāpo nocita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1556: śuddha-vaṃśodbhavatvena śāstrīyam arthaṃ pratipattum arho 'si kim iti na
GE07bhg4c02u:1558: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ na jāyate na mriyate ity-ādinā, deha-pakṣe ca jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyuḥ ity anena śoka-viṣayaṃ nirākṛtya idānīm ubhaya-pakṣe 'pi nirākaroti avyakteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1560: | avyaktāni na vyaktaṃ vyaktir ādau janma-pūrva-kāle yeṣāṃ, kintu tadānīm api liṅga-dehaḥ sthūla-dehaś ca svārambhaka-pṛthivy-ādi-sattvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1563: na vyakti nidhanād anantaraṃ yeṣāṃ tāni |
GE07bhg4c02u:1565: karma-mātrādīnāṃ sattvāt sūkṣma-rūpeṇa bhūtāni santy eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1567: sarva-bhūtāni ādy-antarayor avyaktāni madhye vyaktānīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1568: yad uktaṃ śrutibhiḥ - sthira-cara-jātayaḥ syur ajayottha-nimitta-yujaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1569: kā paridevanā kaḥ śoka-nimittaḥ vilāpaḥ ? tathā coktaṃ nāradena -
GE07bhg4c02u:1570: yan manyase dhruvaṃ lokam adhruvaṃ vā na cobhayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1571: sarvathā na hi śocyās te snehād anyatra mohajāt || [BhP 1.13.44] iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1573: deha-vināśa-hetuka-śoko na yuktas tad-ārambhakāṇāṃ bhūta-mātrāṇām avināśād ity āha avyaktādīnīti
GE07bhg4c02u:1583: evam evāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ - mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1587: | tad-ārambhakāni bhūtāni tu sarvadā santīti teṣu vastutaḥ satsu kā paridevanā kaḥ śoka-nimitta-vilāpa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1588: dehānya-nityātma-pakṣe tu vāsāṃsi ity ādikaṃ na vismartavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1589: yat tv ādy-antayor asattvān madhye 'pi bhūtāny asanty evātaḥ svāpnika-rathāśvādi-prakhyāni mṛṣā-bhūtāny eva tena tad-viyoga-hetukaḥ śokaḥ pratibuddhasya na dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭim
GE07bhg4c02u:1591: tad evaṃ mata-dvaye 'pi deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śoko nāstīti siddham ||28||
GE07bhg4c02u:1593: āścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1594: āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1595: śrīdharaḥ : kutas tarhi vidvāṃso 'pi loke śocanti ? ātmā-jñānād eva ity āśayenātmano durvijñeyatvam āha āścaryavad ityādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1596: kaścid enam ātmānaṃ śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ paśyann āścaryavat paśyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:1604: ca-śabdād uktvāpi na dṛṣṭvāpi na samyag vedeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1606: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu vidvāṃso 'pi bahavaḥ śocanti tat kiṃ mām eva punaḥ punar evam upālabhase
GE07bhg4c02u:1607: anyac ca vaktur eva hi taj jāḍyaṃ śrotā yatra na budhyate iti nyāyāt tvad-vacanārthāpartipattiś ca tavāpy anyeṣām iva
GE07bhg4c02u:1608: svāśaya-doṣād iti nokta-doṣa-dvayam ity abhipretyātmano durvijñeyatām āha āścaryavad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1609: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam āścaryeṇādbhutena tulyatayā vartamānam
GE07bhg4c02u:1611: sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpam api jaḍam ivānanda-ghanam api duḥkhitam iva
GE07bhg4c02u:1612_0: nirvikāram api savikāram iva nityam anityam iva prakāśamānam apy aprakāśamānam iva
GE07bhg4c02u:1612_1: brahmābhinnam api tad-bhinnam iva muktam api baddham ivādvitīyam api sa-dvitīyam
GE07bhg4c02u:1616: samādhi-paripākena sākṣātkaroti kaścic chama-damādi-sādhana-sampanna-carama-śarīraḥ kaścid eva na tu sarvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1617: tathā kaścid enaṃ yat paśyati tad āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1618: ātma-darśanam apy āścaryavad eva yat svarūpato mithyā-bhūtam api satyasya vyañjakam āvidyakam apy avidyāyā vighātakam avidyām upaghnat tat-kāryatayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1620: tathā yaḥ kaścid enaṃ paśyati sa āścaryavad iti kartṛ-viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1622: prārabdha-karma-prābalyāt tadvān iva vyaharati sarvadā samādhi-niṣṭho 'pi
GE07bhg4c02u:1626: tad etat trayam apy āścaryam ātmā taj jñānaṃ taj-jñātā ceti parama-durvijñeyam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ katham anāyāsena jānīyā ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1627: īvam upadeṣṭur abhāvād apy ātmā durvijñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1628: yo hy ātmānaṃ jānāti sa eva tam anyasmai dhruvaṃ brūyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1629: ajñasyopadeṣṭṛtvāsambhavāt, jānaṃs tu samāhita-cittaḥ prāyeṇa kathaṃ bravītu |
GE07bhg4c02u:1634: kāruṇya-mātreṇa bruvaṃs tu parameśvaravad atyanta-durlabha evety āha āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1638: na tu yaḥ paśyati tato 'nya iti vyāghātāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1639: atrāpi karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ kartari cāścaryavad iti yojyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1640: tatra karmaṇaḥ kartuś ca prāg āścaryavattvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ kriyāyās tu vyākhyāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1641: sarva-śabdāvācyasya śuddhasyātmano yad vacanaṃ tad āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1642: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yato vāco nivartante
GE07bhg4c02u:1646: lakṣyatāvacchedakam antareṇaiva pratipādanaṃ tad api nirvikalpa-sākṣātkāra-rūpam atyāścaryam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1647: athavā vinā śaktiṃ vinā lakṣaṇāṃ vinā sambandhāntaraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1651: na ca vinā sambandhaṃ bodhanen 'tiprasaṅgaḥ lakṣaṇā-pakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1655: kaścid eva tātparya-viśeṣam avadhārayati na sarva iti cet |
GE07bhg4c02u:1656: hanta tarhi puruṣa-gata eva kaścid viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c02u:1659: tathā ca yādṛśasya śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tātparyānusandhāna-puraḥ-saraṃ lakṣaṇayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1660: vākyārtha-bodho bhavadbhir aṅgī kriyate tādṛśasyaiva kevalaḥ śabda-viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c02u:1662: etasmin pakṣe śabda-vṛtty-aviṣayatvād yato vāco nivartanta iti sutarām upapannam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1667: hitvā nidrāṃ prabudhyante suṣupter bodhitāḥ paraiḥ ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1668: jāgradvan na yataḥ śabdaṃ suṣupte vetti kaścana |
GE07bhg4c02u:1671: naśyaty avidyayā sārdhaṃ hatvā rogam ivauṣadham || [Bṛhat.Vā 1.4.860-863]
GE07bhg4c02u:1673: tad evaṃ vacana-viṣayasya vaktur vacana-kriyāyāś cātyāścarya-rūpatvād
GE07bhg4c02u:1674: ātmano durvijñānatvam uktvā śrotur durmilatvād api tad āha āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrtuvā 'py enaṃ vedeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1675: anyo draṣṭur vaktuśc a muktād vilakṣaṇo mumukṣur vaktāraṃ brahma-vidaṃ vidhivad upasṛtyainaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1678: śrutvā cainaṃ manana-nididhyāsana-paripākād vedāpi sākṣātkaroty api āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1679: tathā cāścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam iti vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1683: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye |
GE07bhg4c02u:1684: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ || [Gītā 7.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1685: śravaṇāyāpi bahubhir yo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1686: āścaryo vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ || [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:1688: nanu yaḥ śravaṇa-mananādikaṃ karoti sa ātmānaṃ vedeti kim āścaryam ata āha - na caiva kaścid iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1690: kaścid enaṃ naiva veda śravaṇādikaṃ kurvann api |
GE07bhg4c02u:1691: tad akurvaṃs tu na vedeti kim u vaktavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1695: kutas taj-jñānam iti cet tad dhi bandha-parikṣayāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1696: asāv api ca bhūtau vā bhāvī vā vartate 'thavā || [Bṛh. Vā. Sa. 294] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1697: śravaṇādi kurvatām api pratibandha-parikṣayād eva jñānaṃ jāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1699: sa ca pratibandha-parikṣayaḥ kasyacid bhūta eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1706: jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ iti smṛteś ca durvijñeyo 'yam
GE07bhg4c02u:1708: yadi tu śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścid ity eva vyākhyāyeta tadā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śrutyaika-vākyatā na syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1709: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ [Gītā 7.3] iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1711_0: athavā na caiva kaścid ity asya sarvatra sambandhaḥ kaścid enaṃ na paśyati na vadati
GE07bhg4c02u:1711_1: na śṛṇoti śrutvāpi na vedeti pañca prakārā uktāḥ kaścit paśyaty eva na vadati kaścit
GE07bhg4c02u:1711_2: paśyati na vadati ca kaścit tad-vacanaṃ śṛṇoti ca tad-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1712: jānāti ca kaścic chrutvāpi na jānāti na kaścit tu sarva-bahirbhūta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1716: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu kim idam āścaryaṃ brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c02u:1718: yad eva prabodhyamānasyāpy aviveko nāpayātīti tatra satyam evem eva ity āha āścaryavad iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1719: enam ātmānaṃ dehaṃ ca tad-ubhaya-rūpaṃ sarva-lokam ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1720: baladevaḥ : nanu sarvajñena tvayā bahūpadiśyamāno 'py ahaṃ śoka-nivārakam
GE07bhg4c02u:1721: ātma-yāthātmyaṃ na budhye kim etad iti cet tatrāha āścaryavad iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1725: bahu-viruddha-dharmatayāścaryavad adbhuta-sādṛśyena sthitam enaṃ mad-upadiṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ kaścid eva svadharmānuṣṭhānena satya-tapo-japādinā ca
GE07bhg4c02u:1727: āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇaṃ vā kartṛ-viśeṣaṇaṃ veti vyākhyātāraḥ kaścid enam yat paśyati tad āścaryavat |
GE07bhg4c02u:1731: śrutvāpy enam iti kaścit samyag amṛṣṭa-hṛd ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1734: śravaṇāyāpi bahubhir yo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1735: āścaryo vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭa || [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti ||29||
GE07bhg4c02u:1737: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata |
GE07bhg4c02u:1738: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1739: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam avadhyatvam ātmanaḥ saṅkṣepenopadiśan aśocyatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1743_0: sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī liṅga-dehopādhir ātmā vadhyo
GE07bhg4c02u:1743_1: na bhavatīti nityaṃ niyataṃ yasmāt tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthūlāni sūkṣmāṇi ca bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāny
GE07bhg4c02u:1746: liṅga-dehasyāśocyatvam ātmavad evāvadhyatvād iti na sthūla-dehasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1747: liṅga-dehasyātmano vā śocyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1748: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi niścitya brūhi kim ahaṃ kuryāṃ kiṃ vā na kuryām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1749: tatra śokaṃ mā kuru yuddhaṃ tu kurv ity āha dehīti dvābhyām ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1750: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ duradhigamaṃ jīva-yāthātmyaṃ samāsenopadiśann aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1752: ayaṃ dehī jīvo nityam avadhyo yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1755: tad-dehānāṃ tv avaśya-vināśatvāt tattvam ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c02u:1757: sva-dharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1758: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1759: śrīdharaḥ : yac coktam arjunena vepathuś ca śarīre me ity ādi tad apy ayuktam ity āha svadharmam apīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1762: kiṃ ca svadharmam apy avekṣya vikampitum nārhasi iti sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1763: yac coktaṃ - na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhava iti tatrāha dharmyād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1773_0: na kevalaṃ paramārtha-tattvam evāvekṣya kiṃ tu svadharmam api kṣatriya-dharmam api
GE07bhg4c02u:1773_1: yuddhāparāṅmukhatva-rūpam avekṣya śāstrataḥ paryālocya vikampituṃ vicalituṃ dharmād
GE07bhg4c02u:1774_0: tatraivaṃ sati yadyapy ete na paśyanti ity ādinā narake niyataṃ vāso bhavati ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1774_1: antena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:1774_2: ca guru-vadha-brahma-vadhādy-akaraṇaṃ yad abhihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ dharma-śāstra-paryālocanād
GE07bhg4c02u:1775: kasmāt ? hi yasmād dharmyād aparāṅmukhatva-dharmād anapetād yuddhād anyat kṣatriyasya śreyaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:1780: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1784: samottamādhamai rājā tv āhūtaḥ pālayan prajāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1785: na nivarteta saṃgrāmāt kṣātraṃ dharmam anusmaran ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1787: śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājñāṃ śreyaskaraṃ param || [Manu 7.88-9] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1789: tena bhūmi-pālasyaivāyaṃ dharma iti na bhramitavyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1791: kṣatriyo hīti kṣāttraṃ dharmam iti ca spaṣṭaṃ liṅgam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1792: tasmāt kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ praśasto dharma iti sādhu bhagavato 'bhihitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1794: go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvāḥ itivat praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā yuddhād
GE07bhg4c02u:1795: anyac-chreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyata ity uktam iti na doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1796: etena yuddhāt praśastataraṃ kiṃcid anuṣṭhātuṃ tato nivṛttir uciteti nirastam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1797: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity etad api ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1798: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmano nāśābhāvād eva vadhād vikampituṃ bhetuṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1799: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasīti sambandhaḥ ||31||
GE07bhg4c02u:1800: baladevaḥ : evaṃ paramātma-jñānopayogitvād ādau jīvātma-jñānaṃ sarvān prati taulyenopadiśya sa-niṣṭhān prati niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c02u:1804: yuddhaṃ khalu kṣatriyasya nityatam agnihotrādivad vihitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1812: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ || [Manu 7.90]
GE07bhg4c02u:1813: yajñeṣu paśavo brahman hanyante satataṃ dvijaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1814: saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te 'pi svargam avāpnuvan || [?] ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1815: evaṃ nija-dharmam avekṣya vikampituṃ dharmāt pracalituṃ nārhasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1816: yuktaṃ na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ādinā narake nityataṃ vāso bhavatīyt antyena
GE07bhg4c02u:1818: tac cājñānād evety āha dharmyād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1822: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan |
GE07bhg4c02u:1827: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam ||32||
GE07bhg4c02u:1828: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca mahati śreyasi svayam evopāgate sati kuto vikampasa iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1830: yadṛcchayā aprārthitam eva upapannaṃ prāptam īdṛśaṃ yuddham labhante |
GE07bhg4c02u:1832: yad vā ya evaṃvidhaṃ yuddhaṃ labhante ta eva sukhina ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1833: etena svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava iti yad uktaṃ tan nirastaṃ bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:1834: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu yuddhasya kartavyatve 'pi na bhīṣma-droṇādibhir
GE07bhg4c02u:1835: gurubhiḥ saha tat kartum ucitam atigarhitatvād ity āśaṅkyāha yadṛcchayeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1839: kīrti-rājya-lābha-dṛṣṭa-phala-sādhanaṃ yuddhaṃ ye kṣatriyāḥ pratiyogitvena labhante te sukhinaḥ sukha-bhāja eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:1840: jaye satyenāyāsenaiva yaśaso rājyasya ca lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:1841: parājaye cātiśīghram eva svargasya lābhād ity āha
GE07bhg4c02u:1843: apratibaddhaṃ svarga-sādhanaṃ yuddham avyavadhānenaiva svarga-janakaṃ jyotiṣṭhomādikaṃ tu
GE07bhg4c02u:1845: svarga-dvāram ity anena śyenādivat pratyavāya-śaṅkā parihṛtā |
GE07bhg4c02u:1849: bhūtāni, brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1850: pratyavāya-janakatvāt phale vidhy-abhāvāc ca na vidhi-spṛṣṭe
GE07bhg4c02u:1852: yuddhasya hi phalaṃ svargaḥ sa ca na niṣiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1855: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ || [Manu 7.90] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1856: yuddhaṃ tu agnīṣomīyādy-ālambha-vadha-vihitatvān na niṣedhena spraṣṭuṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1860: tathā ca vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyād yuddhaṃ na pratyavāya-janakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1864: guruṃ vā bāla-vṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahu-śrutam |
GE07bhg4c02u:1867: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1868: nātatāyi-vadho doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana || [Manu 8.350-351] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1870: smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:1871: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ || [Yājñavalkya 2.21]
GE07bhg4c02u:1873: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt iti hi dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvād dharma-śāstraṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1874: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet iti ca sva-jīvanārthatvād
GE07bhg4c02u:1876: atrocyate brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta itivad yuddha-vidhāyakam api
GE07bhg4c02u:1877: dharma-śāstram eva sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra
GE07bhg4c02u:1882: mitra-labdhyādy-artha-śāstrānusāreṇa catuṣpād vyavahāre śatror api jaye dharma-śāstrātikramo na kartavya ity etat paraṃ vacanam etad ity āha |
GE07bhg4c02u:1884: tad evaṃ yuddha-karaṇe sukhokteḥ svajanaṃ hi
GE07bhg4c02u:1885: kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ity arjunoktam apākṛtam ||32||
GE07bhg4c02u:1886: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca, jetṛbhyaḥ sakāśād api nyāya-yuddhe mṛtānām adhikaṃ sukham ato bhīṣmādīn hatvā tān pratyuta svato 'pi adhika-sukhinaḥ kuru ity āha yadṛcchayeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1889: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cāyatnād āgate 'smin mahati śreyasi na yuktas te kampa ity āha yadṛcchayeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1891: yatnaṃ vinaiva copapannam īdṛśaṃ bhīṣmādibhir mahā-vīraiḥ saha yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ sabhāgyāḥ kṣatriyā labhante
GE07bhg4c02u:1892: | vijaye satya-śrameṇa kīrti-rājyayor mṛtyau sati śīghram eva svargasya ca
GE07bhg4c02u:1894: etad vyañjayan viśinaṣṭi - svarga-dvāram upāvṛtam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1898: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c02u:1899: tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1900: śrīdharaḥ : viparyaye doṣam āha atha ced iti ||33||
GE07bhg4c02u:1903: api trailokya-rājyasya ity uktatvāt tat kathaṃ mayā kartavyam ity āśaṅkyākaraṇe doṣam āha atha ced iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:1909: na kūṭair āyudhair hanyād yudhyamāno raṇe ripūn |
GE07bhg4c02u:1911: na ca hanyāt sthalārūḍhaṃ na klībaṃ na kṛtāñjalim |
GE07bhg4c02u:1912: na mukta-keśaṃ nāsīnaṃ na tavāsmīti vādinam ||
GE07bhg4c02u:1913: na suptaṃ na visaṃnāhaṃ na nagnaṃ na nirāyudham |
