GE07bhg4c02u:2437: tāni prakarṣeṇāvicchedena dadāti tāṃ bhogaiśvaryayor gatiṃ prāptiṃ prati ye kriyā-viśeṣā jyotiṣṭpmādayas te bahulāḥ pracurā yatra tāṃ vācaṃ vadantīti pūrveṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2439: sudhā-pāna-devāṅganādiḥ, aiśvaryaṃ ca devādi-svāmitvaṃ tayor gatim ity
GE07bhg4c02u:2441_0: baladevaḥ : bhogeti teṣāṃ pūrvoktayor bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānāṃ kṣayitva-doṣāsphūrtyā
GE07bhg4c02u:2441_1: tayor abhiniviṣṭānāṃ tayā puṣpitayā vācāpahṛtam viluptaṃ ceto viveka-jñānaṃ yeṣām
GE07bhg4c02u:2442: samyag ādhīyate 'sminn ātma-tattva-yāthātmyam iti nirukteḥ samādhir manas tasminn ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2446: śrīdharaḥ : nanu svargādikaṃ paramaṃ phalaṃ yadi na bhavati, tarhi kim iti
GE07bhg4c02u:2465: nahi dvandvākulasya yoga-kṣema-vyāpṛtasya ca pramādinas traiguṇyātikramaḥ sambhavatīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2466: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu sakāmānāṃ mā bhūd āśaya-doṣād vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2467: niṣkāmānāṃ tu vyavasāyātmaka-buddhyā karma kurvatāṃ karma-svābhāvyāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2468: svargādi-phala-prāptau jñāna-pratibandhaḥ samāna ity āśaṅkyāha traiguṇyeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2469: | trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ karma traiguṇyaṃ kāma-mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2470: sa eva prakāśatvena viṣayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍātmakā yo yat-phala-kāmas
GE07bhg4c02u:2475: yat-phala-kāmanayānutiṣṭhati tad eva phalaṃ tasmin prayoga iti sthitaṃ yogasiddhy-adhikaraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:2476: yasmād evaṃ kāmā-virahe phala-virahas tasmāt tvaṃ nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2477: he arjuna ! etena karma-svābhāvyāt saṃsāro nirastaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2478: nanu śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-pratīkārāya vastrādy-apekṣaṇāt kuto niṣkāmatvam ata
GE07bhg4c02u:2481: mātrā-sparśās tv ity ukta-nyāyena śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-sahiṣṇur bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2483: rajas-tamobhyām abhibhūta-sattvo hi śītoṣṇādi-pīḍayā mariṣyāmīti manvāno dharmād vimukho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2484: tvaṃ tu rajas tamasī abhibhūya sattva-mātrālambano bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2485: nanu śītoṣṇādi-sahane 'pi kṣut-pipāsādi-pratīkārārthaṃ kiṃcid anupāttam upādeyam upāttaṃ ca rakṣaṇīyam iti tad-arthaṃ yatne kriyamāṇe kutaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2490: na caivaṃ cintā kartavyā katham evaṃ sati jīviṣyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2491: yataḥ sarvāntaryāmī parameśvara eva tava yoga-kṣemādi nirvāhayiṣyatīty āha ātmavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:2492: ātmā paramātmā dhyeyatvena yoga-kṣemādi-nirvāhakatvena ca vartate yasya sa ātmavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:2493: sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena parameśvaram ārādhayato mama sa eva deha-yātrā-mātram apekṣitaṃ sampādayiṣyatīti niścitya niścinto bhavety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2495: viśvanāthaḥ : tvaṃ tu catur-varga-sādhanebhyo virajya kevalaṃ bhakti-yogam
GE07bhg4c02u:2498: prakāśyatvena viṣayā yeṣāṃ te traiguṇya-viṣayā vedāḥ svārthe ṣyañ, etac ca bhūmnā vyapadeśā bhavanti iti nyāyenoktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2500: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau ity ādi śrutayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2501: pañcarātrādi-smṛtayaś ca gītopaniṣad-gopāla-tāpanyādy-upaniṣadaś ca nirguṇāṃ bhaktim api viṣayīkurvanty eva vedoktatvābhāve bhakter aprāmāṇyam
GE07bhg4c02u:2503: tataś ca vedoktā ye triguṇamayā jñāna-karma-vidhayas tebhya eva nirgato bhava tān na kuru
GE07bhg4c02u:2504: ye tu vedoktā bhakti-vidhayas tāṃs tu sarvathaivānutiṣṭha |
GE07bhg4c02u:2515: ataeva nityaiḥ sattvaiḥ prāṇibhir mad-bhaktair eva saha tiṣṭhatīti tathā saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2517: sattva-guṇastho bhaveti vyākhyāyāṃ nistraiguṇyo bhaeti vyākhyāyāṃ virodhaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2519: alabdha-lābho yogaḥ, labdhasya rakṣaṇaṃ kṣemas tad-rahitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2521: yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham it bhakta-vatsalena mayaiva tad-bhāra-vahanāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2526: mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma yat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2528: niṣphalaṃ veti naimittikaṃ nija-karma-phalākāṅkṣyā-rahitam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2529: kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ tu yat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2530: prākṛtaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ man-niṣṭhaṃ nirguṇaṃ smṛtam ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2531: vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2536: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2537: pathyaṃ pūtam anāyastam āhāryaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2539: sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2541: ity antena granthena traiguṇya-vastūny api bhaktyā svasmin kathañcit sthitasya traiguṇyasya nirjayo 'py uktas tad-anantaram eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2543: dravyaṃ deśas tathā kālo jñānaṃ karma ca kārakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2544: śraddhāvasthā-kṛtir niṣṭhā traiguṇyaḥ sarva eva hi ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2546: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anudhyātaṃ buddhyā vā puruṣarṣabha ||
GE07bhg4c02u:2551: atrāpy agre kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate iti praśne vakṣyate --
GE07bhg4c02u:2555: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate ity eṣā |
GE07bhg4c02u:2556: nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān
GE07bhg4c02u:2557: baladevaḥ : nanu phalanairapekṣyeṇa karmāṇi kurvāṇān api tāni sva-phalair
GE07bhg4c02u:2558: yojayeyus tat svābhāvyāt tataḥ kathaṃ tad-buddheḥ sambhava iti cet tatrāha traiguṇyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2562: tad-viṣayā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍāni tvaṃ tu tac-chiro-bhūta-vedānta-niṣṭho nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2565: tat-kāmān anurudhya phalāni prakāśayan svasmiṃs tān viśrambhayati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2567: tan-mūrdha-bhūtopanisat-pratīta-yāthātmya-niścayena tāṃ buddhiṃ yāntīti na cākāmitāny api tāny āpateyuḥ kāmitānām eva teṣāṃ phalatva-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2568: na ca sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ traiguṇya-viṣayatvaṃ nistraiguṇyatāyā aprāmāṇikatvāpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2569: nanu śītoṣṇādi-nivāraṇāya mātrāsparśās tu kaunteyety ādi vimarśena dvandva-saho bhava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2571: nityaṃ yat sattvam apariṇāmitvaṃ jīva-niṣṭhaṃ tat-sthas tad-vibhāvyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2575: nanu kṣut-pipāse tathāpi vādhike iti cet tatrāha ātmavān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2576: ātmā viśvambharaḥ paramātmā sa yasya dhyeyatayāsti tādṛśo bhavety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2577: sa te deha-yātrāṃ sampādayed ity arthaḥ ||45||
GE07bhg4c02u:2582: vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ kubuddhir evety āśaḍkyāha yāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2583: udakaṃ pīyate yasmiṃs tad udapānaṃ vāpī-kūpa-taḍāg-ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2584: tasmin svalpodaka ekatra kṛtsnārthasyāsambhavāt tatra tatra paribhramaṇena vibhāgaśo yāvān
GE07bhg4c02u:2585: snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavati tāvān sarvo 'py arthaḥ sarvataḥ saṃplutodake mahā-hrade ekatraiva yathā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2586: evaṃ yāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tat-karma-phala-rūpo 'rthas tāvān sarvo 'pi vijānato
GE07bhg4c02u:2589: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2590: tasmād iyam eva subuddhir ity arthaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c02u:2591: madhusūdanaḥ : na caivaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena karma kurvann ahaṃ tais taiḥ karma-janitair ānandair vañcitaḥ syām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2595: yāvān artho yāvat-snāna-pānādi-prayojanaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ saṃplutodake mahati jalāśaye tāvān artho bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2596: yathā hi parvata-nirjharāḥ sarvataḥ sravantaḥ kvacid upatyakāyām ekatra milanti tatra pratyekaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2597: udaka-prayojanaṃ samudite sutarāṃ bhavati sarveṣāṃ nirjharāṇām ekatraiva
GE07bhg4c02u:2599: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu vedokteṣu kāmya-karmasu yāvān artho hairaṇyagarbhānanda-paryantas tāvān vijānato brahma-tattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2602: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2606: para-brahmānanda-prāptiḥ syāt tathaiva ca sarvānanda-prāptau na
GE07bhg4c02u:2609: paramānanda-prāpakāya tattva-jñānāya niṣkāma-karmāṇi kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2610: atra yathā tathā bhavatīti-pada-trayādhyāhāro yāvāṃs tāvān iti
GE07bhg4c02u:2612: viśvanāthaḥ : hanta kiṃ vaktavyaṃ niṣkāmasya nirguṇasya bhaktiyogasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2617: mayā vyavasitaḥ samyaṅ nirguṇatvād anāśiṣaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2622: yāvān artha iti kaścit kūpaḥ śauca-karmārthakaḥ, kaścid
GE07bhg4c02u:2624: keśādi-mārjanārthakaḥ, kaścit snānārthakaḥ, kaścit pānārthaka ity evaṃ sarvataḥ sarveṣudapāneṣu yāvān artho yāvanti prayojanānīty arthaḥ tasmin
GE07bhg4c02u:2626: kiṃ ca, tat-tat-kūpeṣu pṛthak pṛthak paribhramaṇa-śrameṇa, sarovare tu taṃ vinaiva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2628: sarovare tu surama-jalenaivety api viśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2631: vijānato vijñasya brāhmaṇasyeti brahma vedaṃ bettīti brahmaṇas tasya vijānato vedajñatve 'pi veda-tātparyaṃ bhaktiṃ viśeṣato jānataḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2636: daivīṃ māyāṃ tu śrī-kāmaḥ ity ādy-uktyā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2639: iti meghādy-amiśrasya saura-kiraṇasya tīvratvam iva bhaktiyogasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2641: atra bahubhyo bahu-kāma-siddhir iti sarvathā bahu-buddhitvam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2645: baladevaḥ : mami sarvān vedān adhīyānasya bahu-kāla-vyayād
GE07bhg4c02u:2646: bahu-vikṣepa-sambhavāc ca kathaṃ tad-buddher abhudayas tatrāha yāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2649: snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ tāvān eva sa tena tasmāt sampadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2650: evaṃ sarveṣu sopaniṣatsu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vedādhyāyino vijānata
GE07bhg4c02u:2652: syāt tāvān eva tena tebhyaḥ sampādyate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2653: tathā ca sva-śākhayaiva sopaniṣadācireṇaiva tat siddhau tad buddhir abhudiyād eveti
GE07bhg4c02u:2654: | iha dārṣṭāntike 'pi yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayam anuṣañjanīyam ||46||
GE07bhg4c02u:2656: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana |
GE07bhg4c02u:2657: mā karma-phala-hetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2658: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi sarvāṇi karma-phalāni parameśvarārādhanād eva bhaviṣyantīty abhisandhāya pravarteta |
GE07bhg4c02u:2659: kiṃ karmaṇā ity āśaṅkya tad vārayann āha karmaṇy eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2663: tat-phalaṃ syād eva bhojane kṛte tṛptivat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2669: kāmyamānasyaiva svargāder niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvād akāmitaṃ phalaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2670: ataeva phalaṃ bandhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe 'pi tava saṅgo niṣṭhā māstu
GE07bhg4c02u:2672: parānanda-prāptiḥ kriyate ced ātma-jñānam eva tarhi sampādyaṃ kiṃ bahvāyāsaiḥ karmabhir bahiraṅga-sādhana-bhūtair ity āśaṅkyāha karmaṇy
GE07bhg4c02u:2675: evāntaḥkaraṇa-śodhake 'dhikāro mayedaṃ kartavyam iti bodho 'stu na
GE07bhg4c02u:2678: tat-phaleṣu svargādiṣu kadācana kasyāṃcid apy avasthāyāṃ karmānuṣṭhānāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2679: prāg ūrdhvaṃ tat-kāle vādhikāro mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti bodho māstu |
GE07bhg4c02u:2680: nanu mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti buddhy-abhāve 'pi karma sva-sāmārthyād eva phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti cen nety āha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2681: phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya heteur utpādako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2682: tvaṃ tu niṣkāmaḥ san karma-phala-hetur mā bhūḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2684: bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ karma phalāya kalpata ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2685: phalābhāve kiṃ karmaṇety ata āha - mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2686: yadi phalaṃ neṣyate kiṃ karmaṇā duḥkha-rūpeṇety akaraṇe tava prītir mā bhūt ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2687: viśvanāthaḥ : evam ekam evārjunaṃ sva-priya-sakhaṃ lakṣīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c02u:2688: jñāna-bhakti-karma-yogān ācikhyāsur bhagavān jñāna-bhakti-yogau procya tayor arjunasyānadhikāraḥ vimṛśya niṣkāma-karma-yogam āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2689: mā phaleṣv iti - phalākāṅkṣiṇo 'py atyanta-śuddha-cittā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2690: tvaṃ tu prāyaḥ śuddha-citta iti mayā jñātvaivocyasa iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2691: nanu karmaṇi kṛte phalam avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2692: tatrāha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya hetur utpādako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2693: tvaṃ tu tādṛśo mā bhūr ity āśīr mayā dīyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2694: akarmaṇi sva-dharmākaraṇe vikarmaṇi pāpe vā saṅgas tava māstu, kintu dveṣa evāstv iti punar apy āśīr dīyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2695: atrāgrimādhyāye vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me ity arjunokti-darśanād atrādhyāye
GE07bhg4c02u:2696: pūrvottara-vākyānām avatārikābhir nātīva saṅgatir vidhitsiteti jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:2697: kintu tva-ājñāyāṃ sārathy-ādau yathāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi, tathā tvam api
GE07bhg4c02u:2698: mad-ājñāyāṃ tiṣṭheti kṛṣṇārjunayor mano 'nulāpo 'yam atra draṣṭavyaḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c02u:2699: baladevaḥ : nanu karmabhir jñāna-siddhir iṣyate cet tarhi tasya śamādīny evāntaraṅgatvād anuṣṭheyāni santu kiṃ bahu prayāsais tair iti cet tatrāha
GE07bhg4c02u:2703: 'dharma-buddher aśuddha-cittasya tāvat karmasv eva yuddhādiṣv adhikāro 'stu mayaitāni bhoktavyānīti tat phaleṣu bandhakeṣu tavādhikāro māstu mayaitāni bhoktavyānīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2704: nanu phalecchā-virahe 'pi tāni sva-phaair yojayeyur iti cet tatrāha mā karmeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2705: karma-phalānāṃ hetur utpādakas tvaṃ mābhūḥ kāmanayā kṛtāni tāni
GE07bhg4c02u:2706: sva-phalair yojayanti kāmitānām eva phalānāṃ niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena
GE07bhg4c02u:2708: ataeva bandhakāni phalāni āpatiṣyantīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe tava saṅgaḥ prītir māstu kintu vidveṣa evāstv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2709: niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi yaṣṭidhānyavad antar eva jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2711: śamādīni tu tat-pṛṣṭha-lagnāny eva syur iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2713: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya |
GE07bhg4c02u:2714: siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2718: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2719: tat-phalasya jñānasyāpi siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2720: yata evaṃbhūtaṃ samatvam eva yoga ucyate sadbhiḥ citta-samādhāna-rūpatvāt ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2721: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvoktam eva vivṛṇoti yoga-stha iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2722: he dhanañjaya tvaṃ yogasthaḥ san saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā karmāṇi kuru |
GE07bhg4c02u:2723: atra bahu-vacanāt karmaṇy evādhikāras ta ity atra jātāv eka-vacanam
GE07bhg4c02u:2724: | saṅga-tyāgopāyam āha siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā phala-siddhau harṣaṃ phalāsiddhau ca viṣādaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhana-buddhyā karmāṇi kurv iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2726: atra tu yoga-sthaḥ karmāṇi kurv ity
GE07bhg4c02u:2728: ataḥ katham etad boddhyṃ śakyam ity ata āha samatvaṃ yoga ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:2729: yad etat siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatvam idam eva yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenocyate na tu karmeti na ko 'pi virodha ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2730: atra pūrvārdhasyottarārdhena vyākhyānaṃ kriyata ity apaunaruktyam iti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ panthāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2731: sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra jayājaya-sāmyena
GE07bhg4c02u:2734: viśvanāthaḥ : niṣkāma-karmaṇaḥ prakāraṃ śikṣayati yoga-stha iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2735: tena jayājayayos tulya-buddhiḥ san saṅgrāmam eva sva-dharmaṃ kurv iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2740: tvaṃ saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā yogasthaḥ san karmāṇi kuru yuddhādīni
GE07bhg4c02u:2747: tad-anuṣaṅga-phalānāṃ jayādīnāṃ siddhāv asiddhau ca samo bhūtvā
GE07bhg4c02u:2749: idam eva samatvaṃ mayā yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenoktaṃ citta-samādhi-rūpatvāt ||48||
GE07bhg4c02u:2751: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanaṃjaya |
GE07bhg4c02u:2753: śrīdharaḥ : kāmyaṃ tu karmātinikṛṣṭam ity āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2754: buddhyā vyavasāyātmikayā kṛtaḥ karma-yogo buddhi-yogo buddhi-sādhana-bhūto vā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2755: tasmāt sakāśād anyat sādhana-bhūtaṃ kāmyaṃ karma dūreṇa avaraṃ atyantam apakṛṣṭaṃ hi |
GE07bhg4c02u:2756: yasmād evaṃ tasmād buddhau jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2758: yad vā buddhau śaraṇaṃ trātāram īśvaram āśrayety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2759: phalahetur astu sakāmā narāḥ kṛpaṇā dīnāḥ yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ ||49||
GE07bhg4c02u:2760: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu kiṃ karmānuṣṭhānam eva puruṣārtho yena niṣphalam eva sadā kartavyam ity ucyate prayojanam anuddiśya na mando 'pi pravartate iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2761: tad varaṃ phala-kāmanayaiva karmānuṣṭhānam iti cen nety āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2763: dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram adhamaṃ karma phalābhisandhinā kriyamāṇaṃ janma-maraṇa-hetu-bhūtam
GE07bhg4c02u:2764: athavā paramātma-buddhi-yogād dūreṇāvaraṃ sarvam api karma yasmād, he dhanañjaya, tasmād buddhau
GE07bhg4c02u:2768: avaraṃ karma kurvanti te kṛpaṇāḥ sarvadā
GE07bhg4c02u:2770: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU
GE07bhg4c02u:2772: tathā ca tvam api kṛpaṇo mā bhūḥ kintu sarvānartha-nivartakātma-jñānotpādakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam evānutiṣṭhety abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2773: yathā hi kṛpaṇā janā atiduḥkhena dhanam arjayanto yat kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c02u:2774: dṛṣṭa-sukha-mātra-lobhena dānādi-janitaṃ mahat sukham anubhavituṃ na śaknuvantīty ātmānam eva vañcayanti tathā mahatā duḥkhena karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2776: daurbhāgyaṃ mauḍhyaṃ ca teṣām iti kṛpaṇa-padena dhvanitam ||49||
GE07bhg4c02u:2782: baladevaḥ : atha kāmya-karmaṇo nikṛṣṭatvam āha dūreṇeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2784: avaraṃ karma dūreṇa, he dhanañjaya, ātma-yāthātmya-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān
GE07bhg4c02u:2785: niṣkāma-karma-yogāt dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram atyapakṛṣṭaṃ janma-maraṇādy-anartha-nimittaṃ kāmyaṃ karmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2786: hi yasmād evam atas tvaṃ buddhau tad-yāthātmya-jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam
GE07bhg4c02u:2788: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avara-karma-kāriṇas te kṛpaṇās tat-phala-janma-karmādi-pravāha-paravaśā dīnā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2789: tathā ca tvaṃ kṛpaṇo mābhūr iti iha kṛpaṇāḥ khalu
GE07bhg4c02u:2795: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam ||50||
GE07bhg4c02u:2796: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yoga-yuktas tu śreṣṭha ity āha buddhi-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2798: te ubhe ihaiva janmani parameśvara-prasādena tyajati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2802: sva-dharmākhyeṣu karmasu vartamānasya yā siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatva-buddhir
GE07bhg4c02u:2805: bandha-svabhāvāny api karmāṇi samatva-buddhyā svabhāvān nivartante |
GE07bhg4c02u:2807: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ buddhi-yogābhāve doṣam uktvā tad-bhāve guṇam āha buddhīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2808: iha karmasu buddhi-yuktaḥ samatva-buddhyā yukto jahāti parityajati ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte
GE07bhg4c02u:2812: yasmād īdṛśaḥ samatva-buddhi-yoga īśvarārpita-cetasaḥ karmasu pravartamānasya kauśalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2817: tvaṃ tu na kuśalo yataś cetano 'pi san
GE07bhg4c02u:2819: athavā iha samatva-buddhi-yukte karmaṇi kṛte sati sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa buddhi-yuktaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2824: samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ kauśalaṃ kuśalo duṣṭa-karma-nivāraṇa-catura ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2826: yataḥ karmasu sakāma-niṣkāmeṣu madhye yoga evodāsīnatvena karma-karaṇam eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:2828: baladevaḥ : uktasya buddhi-yogasya prabhāvam āha buddhīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2832: ca buddhyā yuktas tāni karoti, sa ubhe anādi-kāla-sañcite
GE07bhg4c02u:2840: karmajaṃ buddhi-yuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2842: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇāṃ mokṣa-sādhanatva-prakāram āha karma-jam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2843: karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karma kurvāṇo manīṣiṇo jñānino bhūtvā janma-rūpeṇa bandhena vinirmuktāḥ santo 'nāmayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2845: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu duṣkṛta-hānam apekṣitaṃ na tu sukṛta-hānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2849: hi yasmāt karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa manīṣiṇas tat tvam asi ity ādi-vākya-janyātma-manīṣāvanto bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2850: tādṛśāś ca santo janmātmakena bandhena vinirmuktā viśeṣeṇātyantikatva-lakṣaṇena niravaśeṣaṃ muktāḥ padaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2854: yasmād evaṃ phala-kāmanāṃ tyaktvā samatva-buddhyā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhantas taiḥ kṛtāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhayas tat tvam asy
GE07bhg4c02u:2857: padaṃ gacchanti tasmāt tvam api yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me
GE07bhg4c02u:2858: [Gītā 2.7] ity ukteḥ śreyo jijñāsur evaṃvidhaṃ karma-yogam anutiṣṭheti bhagavato 'bhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2861: buddhi-yuktās tādṛśa-buddhimantaḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhanto manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2862: karmāntargatātma-yāthātmya-prajñāvanto bhūtvā janma-bandhena vinirmuktāḥ santo 'nāmayaṃ kleśa-śūnyaṃ padaṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ gacchantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2863: tasmāt tvam api śreyo jijñāsur evaṃ vidhāni karmāṇi kurv iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2868: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2869: śrīdharaḥ : kadāhaṃ tat padaṃ prāpsyāmi ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c02u:2874_0: evaṃ parameśvarārādhane kriyamāṇe yadā tat-prasādena tava buddhir dehābhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2874_1: moha-mayaṃ gahanaṃ durgaṃ viśeṣeṇātitariṣyati tadā śrotavyasya śrutasya cārthasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2875: tayor anupādeyatvena jijñāsām na kariṣyasīty arthaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2876: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ karmāṇy anutiṣṭhataḥ kadā me sattva-śuddhiḥ syād ity ata āha yadeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2877: na hy etāvatā kālena sattva-śuddhir bhavatīti kāla-niyamo
GE07bhg4c02u:2879: kintu yadā yasmin kāle te tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2880: vyatitariṣyati avivekātmakaṃ kāluṣam aham idaṃ mamedaṃ ity
GE07bhg4c02u:2883: tadā tasmin kāle śrotavyasya śrutasya ca karma-phalasya nirvedaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ gantāsi prāptāsi
GE07bhg4c02u:2884: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedam āyāt [MuṇḍU 1.2.12] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2887: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ parameśvarārpita-niṣkāma-karmābhyāsāt tava yogo bhaviṣyatīty āha yadeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2889_0: moha-rūpaṃ gahanaṃ viśeṣato 'tiśayena tariṣyati, tadā śrotavyasya śrotavyeṣv artheṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:2889_1: śrutasya śruteṣv apy artheṣu nirvedaṃ prāpsyasi asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanayor naṣṭatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2891: sāmprataṃ me sādhaneṣv eva pratikṣaṇam abhyāsaḥ sarvathocita iti maṃsyasa iti bhāvaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2892: baladevaḥ : nanu niṣkāmāṇi karmāṇi kurvato me kadātma-viṣayā
GE07bhg4c02u:2895: moha-kalilaṃ tuccha-phalābhilāṣa-hetum ajñāna-gahanaṃ vyatitariṣyati parityakṣyatīty arthaḥ, tadā pūrvaṃ śrutasyānantaraṃ śrotavyasya ca tasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2897: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedaṃ āyāt iti śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:2898: nirvedena phalena tad-viṣayāṃ tāṃ pariceṣyati iti nāsty atra kāla-niyama ity arthaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c02u:2901: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasyi ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2905: itaḥ pūrvaṃ vikṣiptā satī tava buddhir yadā samādhau sthāsyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:2906: samādhīyate cittam asminn iti samādhiḥ parameśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2909: abhyāsa-pāṭavena tatraiva sthirā ca satī yogaṃ yoga-phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2917: śuddhija-viveka-janitena doṣa-darśanena taṃ vikṣepaṃ parityajya samādhau parmātmani niścalā
GE07bhg4c02u:2918: suṣupti-mūrcchā-stabdhībhāvādi-rūpa-laya-lakṣaṇa-calana-rahitā satī sthāsyati laya-vikṣepa-lakṣaṇau doṣau parityajya samāhitā bhaviṣyatīti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2925: tadā punaḥ sādhyāntarābhāvāt kṛta-kṛtyaḥ sthita-prajño bhaviṣyasīty abhiprāyaḥ ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2928: tatra hetuḥ niścalā teṣu teṣv artheṣu calituṃ vimukhībhūtety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2931: tadā yogam aparokṣānubhava-prāptyā, jīvan-mukta ity arthaḥ ||53||
GE07bhg4c02u:2933: labdha-hṛd-viśuddher abhyuditātma-jñānasya me kadātma-sākṣāt-kṛtir iti cet tatrāha śrutīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2934: śrutyā karmaṇāṃ jñāna-garbhatāṃ prabodhayantyā tam etam
GE07bhg4c02u:2935: ity ādikayā vipratipannā viśeṣeṇa saṃsiddhā te buddhir acalā asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhyāṃ virahitā yadā samādhau manasi
GE07bhg4c02u:2936: nirvāta-dīpa-śikheva niścalā sthāsyati tadā yogam ātmānubhava-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:2943: arjuna uvāca sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhi-sthasya keśava |
GE07bhg4c02u:2944: sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim ||54||
GE07bhg4c02u:2947: svābhāvike samādhau sthitasya, ataeva sthitā niścalā prajñā buddhir yasya tasya bhāṣā kā ? bhāṣyate 'nayā iti bhāṣā lakṣaṇam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:2948: sa kena lakṣaṇena sthita-prajña ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2949: tathā sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇam āsanaṃ vrajanaṃ ca kuryād ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2950: madhusūdanaḥ : evam labdhāvasaraḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇaṃ jñātum arjuna uvāca |
GE07bhg4c02u:2951: yāny eva hi jīvan-muktānāṃ lakṣaṇāni tāny eva mumukṣūṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2953: sthitā niścalā ahaṃ-brahmāsmi iti prajñā yasya sa sthita-prajño 'vasthā-dvayavān samādhistho vyutthita-cittaś ceti
GE07bhg4c02u:2954: | ato viśinaṣṭi samādhi-sthasya sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ? karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī |
GE07bhg4c02u:2956: samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kena lakṣaṇenānyair vyavahriyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2957: sa ca vyutthita-cittaḥ sthita-dhīḥ sthita-prajñaḥ svayaṃ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2961: kathaṃ bahir indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ karoti ? tan-nigrāhābhāva-kāle kiṃ vrajeta kathaṃ viṣayān prāpnoti ? tat-kartṛka-bhāṣaṇāsana-vrajanāni
GE07bhg4c02u:2963: tad evaṃ catvāraḥ praśnāḥ samādhi-sthe sthita-prajña ekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2966: keśaveti sambodhayan sarvāntaryāmitayā tvam evaitādṛśaṃ rahasyaṃ vaktuṃ samartho 'sīti sūcayati
GE07bhg4c02u:2967: viśvanāthaḥ : samādhāv acalā buddhir iti śrutvā tattvato yogino lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati sthita-prajñasyeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2969: kā bhāṣā ? bhāṣyate 'nayeti bhāṣā lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2973: kiṃ prabhāṣeteti sukha-duḥkhayor mānāpamānayoḥ stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayor
GE07bhg4c02u:2974: vā samupasthitayoḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ? spaṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā kiṃ vaded ity
GE07bhg4c02u:2976: kim āsīta ? tad indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanābhāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2977: vrajeta kim ? teṣu calanaṃ vā kīdṛśam iti ||54||
GE07bhg4c02u:2978: baladevaḥ : evam ukto 'rjunaḥ pūrva-padyoktasya sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ jñātuṃ pṛcchati sthiteti |
GE07bhg4c02u:2982: dhīr yasya tasya samādhi-sthasya kā bhāṣā kiṃ lakṣaṇam ? bhāṣyate 'nayeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2985: tathā vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇādīni kuryāt ? tadīyāni tāni pṛthag-jana-vilakṣaṇāni kīdṛśānīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2987: stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayoś ca prāptayor mukhataḥ svagataṃ vā kiṃ brūyāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2988: ? kim āsīta bāhya-viṣayeṣu katham indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ kuryāt ? vrajeta kim ? kiṃ tan-nigrāhābhāve ca kathaṃ viṣayānavāpnuyād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:2991: śrī-bhagavān uvāca prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha mano-gatān |
GE07bhg4c02u:2993: śrīdharaḥ : atra ca yāni sādhakasya jñāna-sādhanāni tāny eva svābhāvikāni
GE07bhg4c02u:2995: ataḥ siddhasya lakṣaṇāni kathayann evāntaraṅgāni jñāna-sādhanāny āha yāvad adhyāya-samāpti
GE07bhg4c02u:2998: manasi sthitān kāmān yadā prakarṣeṇa jahāti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3000: ātmany eva svasminn eva paramānanda-rūpe ātmanā svayam eva tuṣṭa ity ātmārāmaḥ san yadā kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣāṃs tyajati tadā tena lakṣaṇena muniḥ sthita-prajña ucyate ||55||
GE07bhg4c02u:3001: madhusūdanaḥ : eteṣāṃ catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ bhagavān uvāca
GE07bhg4c02u:3005: tantrāntare pañcadhā prapañcitān sarvān niravaśeṣān prakarṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:3006: kāraṇa-bādhena yadā jahāti parityajati sarva-vṛtti-śūnya eva yadā bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:3010: yadi hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā na tyaktuṃ śakyeran vahny-auṣṇyavat svābhāvikatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:3014: nanu sthita-prajñasya mukha-prasāda-liṅga-gamyaḥ santoṣa-viśeṣaḥ pratīyate sa kathaṃ sarva-kāma-parityāge syād ity āha - ātmany eva paramānanda-rūpe
GE07bhg4c02u:3015: na tv anātmani tuccha ātmnaā svaprakāśa-cid-rūpeṇa bhāsamānena na tu
GE07bhg4c02u:3018: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3019: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute || [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3020: tathā ca samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajña evaṃvidhair lakṣaṇa-vācibhiḥ śabdair bhāṣyata iti prathama-praśnasyottaram
GE07bhg4c02u:3021: viśvanāthaḥ : catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaram āha prajahātīti yāvad
GE07bhg4c02u:3023: sarvān iti kasminn apy arthe yasya kiṃcin mātro 'pi
GE07bhg4c02u:3025: mano-gatān iti kāmānām ātma-dharmatvena parityāge yogyatā darśitā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3026: yadi te hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā tāṃs tyaktum aśakyeran vahner auṣṇyavad iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3030: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3031: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute || [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti
GE07bhg4c02u:3032: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa catūrṇāṃ uttaram āha yāvad adhyāya-pūrtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3035: mano-gatān manasi sthitān kāmān sarvān prajahāti saṃtyajati tadā
GE07bhg4c02u:3038: ātma-dharmatve duḥśakyaḥ sa syād vahny-uṣṇatādīnām iveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3039: nanu śuṣka-kāṣṭhavat kathaṃ tiṣṭhatīti cet tatrāha ātmany eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3040: ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi bhāsamānena sva-prakāśānanda-rūpeṇātmanā svarūpeṇa tuṣṭaḥ paritṛptaḥ kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣān saṃtyajyātmānandārāmaḥ samādhisthaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3042: dhṛtāv api manīṣāyāṃ śarīra-brahmaṇor api || iti medinī-kāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3048: duḥkheṣu prāpteṣv api anudvignam akṣubhitaṃ mano yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3056: tatra kiṃ prabhāṣetety asyottaram āha duḥkheṣv iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:3061: prārabdha-pāpa-karma-prāpiteṣu nodvignaṃ duḥkha-parihārākṣamatayā vyākulaṃ na bhavati mano yasya so 'nudvigna-manāḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3063: satyām aho pāpo 'haṃ dhiṅ māṃ durātmānam etādṛśa-duḥkha-bhāginaṃ ko me duḥkham īdṛśaṃ nirākuryād ity anutāpātmako bhrānti-rūpas tāmasaś
GE07bhg4c02u:3065: yady ayaṃ pāpānuṣṭhāna-samaye syāt tadā tat-pravṛtti-pratibandhakatvena saphalaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3066_0: bhoga-kāle tu bhavan kāraṇe sati kāryasyocchettum aśakyatvān niṣprayojano duḥkha-kāraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:3066_1: saty api kim iti mama duḥkhaṃ jāyate iti avivekaja-bhrama-rūpatvān na vivekinaḥ sthita-prajñasya
GE07bhg4c02u:3067: duḥkha-mātraṃ hi prārabdha-karmaṇā prāpyate na tu tad-uttara-kālīno bhramo 'pi |
GE07bhg4c02u:3068: nanu duḥkhāntara-kāraṇatvāt so 'pi prārabdha-karmāntareṇa prāpyatām iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c02u:3078: taj-jātīya-sukhasya kāraṇaṃ dharmam ananuṣṭhāya vṛthaiva tad-ākāṅkṣā-rūpā
GE07bhg4c02u:3081: na hi kāraṇābhāve kāryaṃ bhavitum arhati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3082: ato yathā sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ mā bhūd iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpa udvego vivekino na sambhavati tathaivāsati
GE07bhg4c02u:3083: kāryaṃ bhūyād iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpā tṛṣṇātmikā spṛhāpi nopapadyate
GE07bhg4c02u:3087: aho dhanyo 'haṃ yasya mamedṛśaṃ sukham upasthitaṃ ko vā mayā tulas tribhuvane
GE07bhg4c02u:3088: kena vopāyena mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ na vicchidyetety evam ātmikotphullatā-rūpā
GE07bhg4c02u:3090: ataevoktaṃ bhāṣye - nāgnir ivendhanādy-ādhāne yaḥ sukhāny anuvivardhate sa vigata-spṛhaḥ iti
GE07bhg4c02u:3091: vakṣyati ca -- na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam [Gītā 5.20] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3096: nāśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇāsāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasya dainyātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣo bhayam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3098: samupasthite tan-nivāraṇa-sāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasyābhijvalanātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3099: te sarve viparyaya-rūpatvād vigatā yasmāt sa
GE07bhg4c02u:3101: etādṛśo munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī sthita-prajña ucyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3105: mumukṣur duḥkhe nodvijet sukhe na prahṛṣyet, rāga-bhaya-krodha-rahitaś ca bhaved ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3106: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ prabhāṣetety asya uttaram āha duḥkheṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:3108: anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdhaṃ duḥkham idaṃ mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyam iti svagataṃ kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ san spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvan |
GE07bhg4c02u:3112: sudhiyā paricito bhraṣṭa evocyata iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3113: evaṃ sukheṣv apy upasthiteṣu vigata-spṛha iti prārabdham idam
GE07bhg4c02u:3114: avaśya-bhogyam iti svagataṃ spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvāṇasya tasya
GE07bhg4c02u:3117: eva spaṣṭīkṛtya darśayati vīto vigato rāgo 'nurāgaḥ sukheṣu bandhu-janeṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:3122: baladevaḥ : atha vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kiṃ bhāṣetety asyottaram āha duḥkheṣv iti dvyābhyām
GE07bhg4c02u:3123: trividheṣv adhyātmikādiṣu duḥkheṣu samutthiteṣu satsv anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdha-phalāny amūni mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyānīti
GE07bhg4c02u:3124: kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ svagataṃ vā bruvan tebhyo nodvijata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3127: prārabdhākṛṣṭāny amūni mayāvaśya-bhoktavyānīti kenacit pṛṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā bruvan tair upasthitaḥ prahṛṣṭa-mukho na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3130: vīta-bhayaḥ viṣayāpahartṛṣu prāpteṣu durlabhasya mamaitāni dharmyair bhavadbhir hriyanta iti dainya-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3131: vīta-krodhaḥ teṣv eva prabalasya mamaitāni tucchair bhavadbhiḥ katham apahartavyānīti krodha-śūnyaś ca |
GE07bhg4c02u:3134: itthaṃ svānubhavaṃ parān prati svagataṃ vā vadan naudvego nispṛhatādi-vacaḥ prabhāṣate ity uttaram ||56||
GE07bhg4c02u:3136: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham |
GE07bhg4c02u:3137: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:3138: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ bhāṣeta ity asyottaram āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3139: yaḥ sarvatra putra-mitrādiṣv apy anabhisnehaḥ sneha-varjitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3140: ataeva bādhitānuvṛttyā tat tat śubham anukūlaṃ prāpya nābhinandati aśubhaṃ pratikūlaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi na nindati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3144: sarva-deheṣu jīvanādiṣv api yo munir anabhisnehaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:3145: yasmin saty anyadīye hāni-vṛddhī svasminn āropyete sa tādṛśo 'nya-viṣayaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3146: premāpara-paryāyas tāmaso vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ snehaḥ sarva-prakāreṇa tad-rahito
GE07bhg4c02u:3148: bhagavati paramātmani tu sarvathābhisnehavān bhaved eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:3150: tat-tat-prārabdha-karma-pariprāpitaṃ śubhaṃ sukha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya nābhinandati harṣa-viśeṣa-puraḥsaraṃ na praśaṃsati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3152: viṣayaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi antar-asūyā-pūrvakaṃ na nindati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3153: ajñasya hi sukha-hetur yaḥ sva-kalatrādiḥ sa śubho viṣayas
GE07bhg4c02u:3155: sa ca tāmasaḥ, tad-guṇa-kathanādeḥ para-prarocanārthatvābhāvena vyarthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3156: evam asūyotpādanena duḥkha-hetuḥ parakīya-vidyā-prakarṣādir enaṃ pratyaśubho viṣayas tan-nindādi-pravartikā bhrānti-rūpā dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3160: abhinanda-dveṣau bhrānti-rūpau tāmasau katham abhrānte śuddha-sattve
GE07bhg4c02u:3166: śubhaṃ prāpya na praśaṃset, aśubhaṃ prāpya na
GE07bhg4c02u:3168: atra ca nindā-praśaṃsādi-rūpā vāco na prabhāṣeteti
GE07bhg4c02u:3170: viśvanāthaḥ : anabhisnehaḥ sopādhi-sneha-śūnyo dayālutvān nirupādhir īṣan-mātra-snehas tu tiṣṭhed eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:3174: na praśaṃsati tvaṃ dhārmikaḥ paramahaṃsa-sevī sukhī bhaveti na brūte |
GE07bhg4c02u:3175: na dveṣṭi tvaṃ pāpātmā narake pateti nābhiśapati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3176: tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā samādhiṃ prati sthitā
GE07bhg4c02u:3178: baladevaḥ : ya iti sarveṣu prāṇiṣu anabhisneha aupādhika-sneha-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3179: kāruṇikatvān nirupādhir īṣad-snehas tv asty eva |
GE07bhg4c02u:3180: tat tat prasiddhaṃ śubham uttama-bhojana-srak-candanārpaṇa-rūpaṃ prāpya nābhinandati tad-arpakaṃ prati dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ ciraṃ jīveti na vadati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3181: aśubham apamānaṃ yaṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya na dveṣṭi, pāpiṣṭhas tvaṃ miryasveti
GE07bhg4c02u:3183: tasya prajñeti sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3185: stuti-nindā-rūpaṃ vaco na bhāṣata iti vyatirekeṇa tal lakṣaṇam ||57||
GE07bhg4c02u:3190: yadā cāyaṃ yogī indriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sakāśād indriyāṇi saṃharate sarvata evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭha
GE07bhg4c02u:3194: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ kim āsīteti praśnasyottaraṃ vaktum ārabhate bhagavān ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokaiḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3195: tatra prārabdha-karma-vaśād vyutthānena vikṣiptānīndriyāṇi punar upasaṃhṛtya samādhy-artham
GE07bhg4c02u:3197: ayaṃ vyutthitaḥ sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3207: viśvanāthaḥ : kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3209: svādhīnānām indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanaṃ niṣidhyāntareva niścalatayā sthāpanaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3213: mukha-netrādīni yathā svāntar eva svecchayā sthāpayati ||58||
GE07bhg4c02u:3214: baladevaḥ : atha kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir |
GE07bhg4c02u:3215: ayaṃ yogī yadā cendriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ svādhīnānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīny anāyāsena saṃharati samākarṣati tadā tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3217: mukha-kara-caraṇāni yathānāyasena kamaṭhaḥ saṃharati tadvat viṣayebhyaḥ samākṛṣṭendriyāṇām
GE07bhg4c02u:3221: rasa-varjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:3222: śrīdharaḥ : nanu nendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv apravṛttir sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati
GE07bhg4c02u:3223: jaḍānām āturāṇām upavāsa-parāṇāṃ ca viṣayeṣv pravṛtter
GE07bhg4c02u:3227: nirāhārasya indriyāir viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvato dehino dehābhimānino 'jñasya rāgo 'bhilāṣas tad-varjaṃ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3229: yad vā nirāhārasya upavāsa-parasya viṣayāḥ prāyaśo nivartante
GE07bhg4c02u:3231: rasāpekṣā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3233: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu mūḍhasyāpi rogādi-vaśād viṣayebhya indriyāṇām upasaṃharaṇaṃ bhavati tat kathaṃ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety uktam ? ata āha viṣayā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3234: nirāhārasya indriyāir indriyāir viṣayān anāharato dehino dehābhimānavato mūḍhasyāpi rogiṇaḥ kāṣṭha-tapasvino vā viṣayāḥ śabdādayo
GE07bhg4c02u:3235: vinivartante kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasa-tṛṣṇā taṃ varjayitvā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3236: ajñasya viṣayā nivartante tad-viṣayo rāgas tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3237: asya tu sthita-prajñasya paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad evāham asmīti sākṣātkṛtya sthitasya raso 'pi kṣudra-sukha-rāgo 'pi nivartate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3239: tathā ca yāvān artha ity ādau vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3240: evaṃ ca sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttiḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇam iti na mūḍhe vyabhicāra ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3242: tasmāt sa-rāga-viṣayocchedikāyāḥ samyag-darśanātmikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ sthairyaṃ mahatā yatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:3243: viśvanāthaḥ : mūḍhasyāpi upavāsato rogādi-vaśād vendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv acalanaṃ sambhavet tatrāha viṣayā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3246: abhilāṣas tu viṣayeṣu na nivartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3248: sthita-prajñasya tu paraṃ paramātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣayeṣv abhilāṣo nivartata iti na lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāraḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3249: ātma-sākṣātkāra-samarthasya tu sādhakatvam eva, na tu siddhatvam iti bhāvaḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:3250: baladevaḥ : nanu mūḍhasyāmaya-grastasya viṣayeṣv indriyāpravṛtti-dṛṣṭā tat katham etat sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāha viṣayā iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3252: roga-bhayād bhojanādīny akurvato mūḍhasyāpi dehino janasya viṣayās
GE07bhg4c02u:3257: 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sva-prakāśānandam ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvānubhūya nivartate
GE07bhg4c02u:3258: vinaśyatīti sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttis tasya lakṣaṇam iti na vyabhicāraḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c02u:3260: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3262: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamaṃ vinā sthita-prajñatā na sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3263: ataḥ sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tatra mahān prayatnaḥ kartavya ity āha yatato hy apīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:3269: cāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad-ubhayābhāve prajñā-nāśa-darśanād iti vaktuṃ bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve prathamaṃ doṣam āha yatata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3271: yatato bhūyo bhūyo viṣaya-doṣa-darśanātmakaṃ yatnaṃ kurvato 'pi, cakṣiṅo
GE07bhg4c02u:3274: vipaścito 'tyanta-vivekino 'pi puruṣasya manaḥ kṣaṇa-mātraṃ nirvikāraṃ kṛtam apīndriyāṇi haranti vikāraṃ prāpayanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3275: nanu virodhinī viveke sati kuto vikāra-prāptis tatrāha pramāthīni pramathana-śīlāni atibalīyastvād vivekopamardana-kṣamāṇi |
GE07bhg4c02u:3276: ataḥ prasabhaṃ prasahya balātkāreṇa paśyaty eva vipaściti svāmini viveke ca rakṣake sati
GE07bhg4c02u:3277: sarva-pramāthītvād evendriyāṇi vivekaja-prajñāyāṃ praviṣṭaṃ manas tataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3280_0: prasiddho hy ayam artho loke yathā pramāthino dasyavaḥ prasabham eva dhaninaṃ dhana-rakṣakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3280_1: cābhibhūya tayoḥ paśyator eva dhanaṃ haranti tathendriyāṇy api viṣaya-sannidhāne
GE07bhg4c02u:3280_2: mano harantīti viśvanāthaḥ : sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tu yatna eva mahān, na tv indriyāṇi
GE07bhg4c02u:3281: parāvartayituṃ sarvathā śaktir ity āha yatata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3284: baladevaḥ : athāsyā jñāna-niṣṭhayā daurlabhyam āha yatato hīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3286: viṣayātma-svarūpa-vivekajñasya tata indriya-jaye prayatamānasyāpi puruṣasya indriyāṇi śrotrādīni kartṝṇi manaḥ parasabhaṃ balād iva haranti
GE07bhg4c02u:3289: sthite kathaṃ haranti tatrāha pramāthīnīti ati-baliṣṭhatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:3294: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3295: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:3297: yukto yogī tāni indriyāṇi saṃyamya mat-paraḥ sann āsīta |
GE07bhg4c02u:3299: etena ca katham āsīteti praśnasya vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:3300: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ tarhi tatra kaḥ pratīkāra ity ata āha tānīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3301: tānīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi jñāna-karma-sādhana-bhūtāni saṃyamya vaśīkṛtya yuktaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3302: samāhito nigṛhīta-manāḥ sann āsīta nirvāpāras tiṣṭhet |
GE07bhg4c02u:3303: pramāthināṃ kathaṃ sva-vaśīkaraṇam iti cet tatrāha mat-para iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3304: ahaṃ sarvātmā vāsudeva eva para utkṛṣṭa upādeyo yasya sa mat-para ekānta-mad-bhakta ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3305: tathā coktam na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3306: yathā hi loke balavantaṃ rājānam āśritya dasyavo nigṛhyante rājāśrito 'yam iti jñātvā ca svayam eva tad-vaśyā bhavanti tathaiva bhagavantaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3307: sarvāntaryāminam āśritya tat-prabhāveṇaiva duṣṭānīndriyāṇi nigrāhyāṇi punaś ca bhagavad-āśrito 'yam iti matvā tāni tad-vaśyāny eva bhavantīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3308: yathā ca bhagavad-bhakter mahā-prabhāvatvaṃ tathā vistareṇāgre vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3311: tad etad vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti kim āsīteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:3318: athāta ānanda-dughaṃ padāmbujaṃ haṃsāḥ śrayeran || [BhP 11.29.1-2] iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3319: vaśe hīti sthita-prajñasyendriyāṇi vaśībhūtāni bhavantīti sādhakād viśeṣa uktaḥ ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:3320: baladevaḥ : nanu nirjitendriyāṇām apy ātmānubhavo na pratītas tatra ko 'bhyupāya iti cet tatrāha tānīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3322: man-niṣṭhaḥ san yuktaḥ kṛtāma-samādhir āsīta tiṣṭheta |
GE07bhg4c02u:3326: tathā citta-sthito viṣṇur yogināṃ sarva-kilbiṣam || [ViP 6.7.74] ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c02u:3328: itthaṃ ca vaśīkṛtendriyatayāvasthitiḥ kim āsītety asyottaram uktam ||61||
GE07bhg4c02u:3334: śrīdharaḥ : bāhyendriya-saṃyamābhāve doṣam uktvā manaḥ-saṃyamābhāve doṣam āha dhyāyata iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:3335: guṇa-buddhyā viṣayān dhyāyataḥ puṃsaḥ teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3336: āsaktyā ca teṣu adhikaḥ kāmo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3337: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3345: punaḥ punaś cintayataḥ puṃsas teṣu viṣayeṣu saṅga āsaṅgo mamātyantaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3346: sukha-hetava eta ity evaṃ śobhanādhyāsa-lakṣaṇaḥ prīti-viśeṣa upajāyate saṅgāt sukha-hetutva-jñāna-lakṣaṇāt saṃjāyate kāmo mamaite bhavantv iti tṛṣṇā-viśeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3350: saṃmohāt smṛti-vibhramaḥ smṛteḥ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusandhānasya vibhramo vicalanaṃ vibhraṃśaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3351: tasmāc ca smṛti-bhraṃśād buddher aikātmyākāra-mano-vṛtter nāśo
GE07bhg4c02u:3352: viparīta-bhāvanopacaya-doṣeṇa pratibandhād anutpattir utpannāyāś ca phalāyogyatvena vilayaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3355: yo hi puruṣārthāyogyo jātaḥ sa mṛta eveti loke vyavahriyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3358: paramānartha-prāptis taramān mahatā prayatnena mano nigṛhṇīyād ity
GE07bhg4c02u:3360: ato yuktam uktaṃ tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīteti ||62-63||
GE07bhg4c02u:3362: bāhyendriya-vaśīkāra-kāraṇaṃ sarvathā mano-vaśīkārābhāve tu yat syāt tat śṛṇv ity āha dhyāyata iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3371: baladevaḥ : vijitendriyasyāpi mayy aniveśita-manasaḥ punar anartho durvāra
GE07bhg4c02u:3374: dhyāyataḥ punaḥ punaś cintayato yoginas teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3376: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodhaś citta-jvālas tat-pratighātako bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3381: buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati punar viṣaya-bhoga-nimagno bhavati saṃsaratīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3382: madanāśrayaṇād durbalaṃ manas tāni sva-viṣayair yojayantīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3387: śrīdharaḥ : nanv indriyāṇāṃ viṣaya-pravaṇa-svabhāvānāṃ niroddhum aśakyatvād ayaṃ doṣo duṣparihara iti sthita-prajñatvaṃ kathaṃ syāt ? ity āśaṅkyāha rāga-dveṣa iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c02u:3389: indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś carann upabhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ śāntiṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3391: ātmano manasaḥ vaśyair indriyaiḥ vidheyo vaśavartī ātmā mano yasyeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3393: caturtha-praśnasya svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān gacchatīty uttaram uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3395: madhusūdanaḥ : manasi nigṛhīte tu bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve 'pi na doṣa iti
GE07bhg4c02u:3397: yo 'samāhita-cetāḥ sa bāhyendriyāṇi nigṛhyāpi rāga-dveṣa-duṣṭena manasā viṣayāṃś cintayan
GE07bhg4c02u:3401: svādhīnair iti vā rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ viyuktair virahitair indriyaiḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3402: śrotrādibhir viṣayān śabdādīn aniṣiddhāṃś carann upalabhamānaḥ prasādaṃ prasannātāṃ cittasya svacchatāṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatām adhigacchati
GE07bhg4c02u:3407: | avarjanīyatayā tu viṣayopalambho na doṣam āvahatīti na śuddhi-vyāghāta
GE07bhg4c02u:3409: etena viṣayāṇāṃ smaraṇam api ced anartha-kāraṇaṃ sutarāṃ tarhi bhogas tena jīvanārthaṃ viṣayān bhuñjānaḥ katham anarthaṃ na pratipadyeteti śaṅkā
GE07bhg4c02u:3411: svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān prāpnotīti ca kiṃ vrajeteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati ||64||
GE07bhg4c02u:3413: viṣaya-grahaṇe 'pi na doṣa iti vadan sthita-prajño vrajeta kim ity
GE07bhg4c02u:3415: vidheyo vacane sthta ātmā mano yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3418: prasādam adhigacchatīty etādṛśasyādhikāriṇo viṣaya-grahaṇam api na doṣa
GE07bhg4c02u:3419: iti kiṃ vaktavyam ? pratyuta guṇa eveti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3421: viṣaya-tyāga-svīkārāv eva āsana-vrajane te ubhe api tasya bhadre iti
GE07bhg4c02u:3423: baladevaḥ : manasi nirjite śrotrādi-nirjayābhāvo 'pi na doṣa iti bruvan vrajeta kim ity asottaram āha rāgeti ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3424: vijita-bahir-indriyo 'pi mad-anarpita-manāḥ paramārthād vicyuta ity uktam
GE07bhg4c02u:3425_0: | yo vidheyātmā svādhīna-manā mad-arpita-manās tata eva nidagdha-rāgādi-mano-malaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3425_1: sa tv ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnair ata eva rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ viyuktair indriyaiḥ śrotrādyair
GE07bhg4c02u:3425_2: viṣayān niṣiddhān śabdādīṃś caran bhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ viṣayāsakty-ādi-malānāgamād
GE07bhg4c02u:3430: śrīdharaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity atrāha prasāda iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3432: tataś ca prasanna-cetaso buddhiḥ pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīty arthaḥ ||65||
GE07bhg4c02u:3433: madhusūdanaḥ : prasādam adhigacchatīty uktaṃ tatra prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity ucyate prasāda iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3435: sarva-duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ajñāna-vilasitānāṃ hānir vināśo 'sya yater upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3436: hi yasmāt prasanna-cetaso yater āśu śīghram eva buddhir brahmātmaikyākārā paryavatiṣṭhate pari samantād avatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:3441: tat-kārya-sakala-duḥkha-hānir iti krame 'pi prasāde yatrādhikyāya sarva-duḥkha-hāni-karatva-kathanam iti na virodhaḥ ||65||
GE07bhg4c02u:3443: sthirī-bhavatīti viṣaya-grahaṇābhāvād api samucita-viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ tasya sukham iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3445: tayā vinā tu na citta-prasāda iti prathama-skandha eva prapañcitam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3448: baladevaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity āha asya yogino manaḥ prasāde sati sarveṣāṃ prakṛti-saṃsarga-kṛtānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ hānir upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3452: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3453: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:3461: bhāvanayā hi buddher ātmani pratiṣṭhā bhavati, sā ca ayuktasya yato nāsti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3462: na cābhāvayataḥ ātma-dhyānam akurvataḥ śāntiḥ ātmani cittoparamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3463: aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:3464: madhusūdanaḥ : imam evārthaṃ vyatireka-mukhena draḍhayati nāstīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3472: aśāntasyātma-sākṣātkāra-śūnyasya kutaḥ sukhaṃ mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ ||66||
GE07bhg4c02u:3473: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam arthaṃ vyatireka-mukhena draḍhayati nāstīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3481: mad-aniveśita-manaso buddhir ukta-lakṣaṇā nāsti na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3489: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:3490: śrīdharaḥ : nāsti buddhir ayuktasya [Gītā 2.66] ity atra hetum āha indriyāṇām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3491: indriyāṇām avaśīkṛtānāṃ svairaṃ viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yadaivaikam indriyaṃ mano 'nuvidhīyate |vaśīkṛtaṃ sad-indriyeṇa saha
GE07bhg4c02u:3492: gacchati, tadaivaikam indriyasya manasaḥ puruṣasya vā prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati viṣaya-vikṣiptāṃ karoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3493: kim uta vaktavyaṃ bahūni prajñāṃ harantīti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3494: yathā pramattasya karṇadhārasya nāvaṃ vāyuḥ sarvataḥ paribhramayati tadvad iti ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:3495: madhusūdanaḥ : ayuktasya kuto nāsti buddhir ity ata āha indriyāṇām iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3496: caratāṃ sva-viṣayeṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu pravartamānānām avaśīkṛtānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekam apīndriyam anulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate preryate pravartate iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c02u:3498: tat indriyam ekam api manasānusṛtam asya sādhakasya manaso vā prajñām ātma-viṣayāṃ śāstrīyāṃ harati apanayati manasas tad-viṣayāviṣṭatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3499: yadaikam apīndriyaṃ prajñāṃ harati tadā sarvāṇi harantīti kim u vaktavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3501: abhyasyeti vāyor naukā-haraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ na bhuvīti sūcayitum ambhasīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3502: evaṃ dārṣṭāntike 'py ambhaḥ-sthānīye manaś cāñcalye saty eva prajñā-haraṇa-sāmarthyam indriyasya na tu bhū-sthānīye
GE07bhg4c02u:3504: viśvanāthaḥ : ayuktasya buddhir nāstīty upapādayati indriyāṇāṃ sva-sva-viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yan mama ekam indriyam anuvidhīyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3505: puṃsāṃ sarvendriyānuvartiḥ kriyate, tad eva mano 'sya prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3508_0: viṣayeṣu caratām avijitānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekaṃ śrotraṃ vā cakṣur vānulakṣyīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c02u:3508_1: mano vidhīyate pravartate, tad ekam evendriyaṃ manasānugatam asya pravartakasya prajñāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3511: pratikūlo vāyur yathāmbhasi nīyamānāṃ nāvaṃ tadvat ||67||
GE07bhg4c02u:3515: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñatve sādhanatvaṃ coktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3516: sādhanatvopasaṃhāre tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā jñātavyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3517: mahābāho ! iti sambodhayan vairi-nigrahe samarthasya tavātrāpi sāmarthyaṃ bhaved iti sūcayati
GE07bhg4c02u:3518: madhusūdanaḥ : hi yasmād evaṃ tasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3525: sthita-prajñaṃ prati lakṣaṇatvasya mumukṣuṃ prati prajñā-sādhanatvasya
GE07bhg4c02u:3533: he mahābāho iti yathā ripūn nigṛhṇāsi tathendriyāṇi nigṛhāṇety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3538: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī |
GE07bhg4c02u:3539: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ ||69||
GE07bhg4c02u:3540: śrīdharaḥ : nanu na kaścid api prasupta iva darśanādi-vyāpāra-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3551: tasyāṃ darśanādi-vyāpāras tasya nāsti ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3552: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā divāndhānām ulukādīnāṃ rātrāv eva darśanaṃ na tu divase |
GE07bhg4c02u:3556: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ mumukṣuṇā prajñā-sthairyāya prayatna-pūrvakam
GE07bhg4c02u:3557: indriya-saṃyamaḥ kartavya ity uktaṃ sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ siddha eva
GE07bhg4c02u:3561: ajñānāṃ niśeva niśā tān praty aprakāśa-rūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3564: prabuddhaḥ san sāvadhāno vartate saṃyamīndriya-saṃyamavān sthita-prajña
GE07bhg4c02u:3567: prasuptāny eva bhūtāni jāgrati svapnavad vyavaharanti sā niśā na prakāśata
GE07bhg4c02u:3569: yāvad dhi na prabudhyate tāvad eva svapna-darśanaṃ bodhya-paryantatvād bhramasya
GE07bhg4c02u:3570: tattva-jñāna-kāle tu na bhrama-nimittaḥ kaścid vyavahāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3572: kāraka-vyavahāre hi śuddhaṃ vastu na vīkṣyante |
GE07bhg4c02u:3573: śuddhe vastuni siddhe ca kāraka-vyāpṛtis tathā ||
GE07bhg4c02u:3575: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānām ity avocat svayaṃ hariḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3576: tathā ca yasya viparīta-darśanaṃ tasya na vastu-darśanaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3581: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyet |
GE07bhg4c02u:3582: yatra svasya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet || iti vidyāvidyayor vyavasthām āha |
GE07bhg4c02u:3584: dinam ulūkasya divāndhasya niśā rātrau paśyataś colūkasya yad dinaṃ rātrir eva sā kākasyeti mahad āścaryam etat |
GE07bhg4c02u:3586: āvidyaka-kriyā-kārakādi-vyavahāraḥ syād iti svataḥ siddha eva tasyendriya-saṃyama ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3587: viśvanāthaḥ : sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ-siddha eva sarvendriya-nigraha
GE07bhg4c02u:3589: buddhir hi dvividhā bhavati ātma-pravaṇā viṣaya-pravaṇā ca
GE07bhg4c02u:3590: | tatra yā ātma-pravaṇā buddhiḥ sā sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3591: niśāyāṃ kiṃ kiṃ syād iti tasyāṃ svapanto janā yathā na jānanti, tathaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:3592: ātma-pravaṇa-buddhau prāpyamāṇaṃ vastu sarva-bhūtāni na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3598: buddhau bhūtāni jāgrati, tan-niṣṭhaṃ viṣaya-sukha-śoka-mohādikaṃ sākṣād anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3600: tan-niṣṭhaṃ kim api nānubhavati ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3602: sukha-duḥkha-pradān viṣayān tatraudāsīnyenāvalokayataḥ svabhogyān viṣayān api yathocitaṃ nirlepam ādadānasyety arthaḥ ||69||
GE07bhg4c02u:3611: ivātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau svapanto janās tal-labhyam ātmānaṃ sarve nānubhavantīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3612: saṃyamī jitendriyas tu tasyāṃ jāgarti na tu svapiti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3615: viṣya-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau bhūtānio jāgrati viṣaya-bhogān anubhavanti na tu
GE07bhg4c02u:3616: tatra svapanti sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3620: ātmānaṃ sākṣād anubhavataḥ prārabdhaākṛṣṭān viṣayān apy audāsīnyena bhuñjānasya cety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3626: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma-kāmī ||70||
GE07bhg4c02u:3627: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭy-abhāve katham asau tān bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha āpūryamāṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3628: nānā-nada-nadīnbhir āpūryamāṇam api acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādam eva samudraṃ punar api anyā āpo
GE07bhg4c02u:3629: yathā praviśanti tathā kāmā viṣayā yaṃ munim antar-dṛṣṭiṃ bhogair avikriyamāṇam eva prārabdha-karmabhir ākṣiptāḥ santaḥ praviśanti sa śāntim kaivalyaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3633: sarvābhir nadībhir āpūryamāṇaṃ santaṃ vṛṣṭy-ādi-prabhavā api sarvā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti
GE07bhg4c02u:3635: acalānāṃ mainākādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā yasminn iti vā gāmbhīryātiśaya uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3636: yadvad yena prakāreṇa nirvikāratvena tadvat tenaiva nirvikāratva-prakāreṇa yaṃ sthita-prajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3637_0: nirvikāram eva santaṃ kāmā ajñair lokaiḥ kāmyamānāḥ śabdādyāḥ sarve viṣayā avarjanīyatayā
GE07bhg4c02u:3637_1: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ śaknuvanti sa mahā-samudra-sthānīyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3641: kāmān viṣayān kāmayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa kāma-kāmy ajñaḥ śāntiṃ samākhyātāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3643: api tu sarvadā laukikālaukika-karma-vikṣepeṇa mahati kleśārṇave magno bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3647: viśvanāthaḥ : viṣaya-grahaṇe kṣobha-rāhityam eva nirlepety āha āpūryamāṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3648: yathā varṣāsu itas tataḥ nādeyā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti kīdṛśam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3649: ā īṣad api āpūryamāṇam tāvatībhir apy adbhiḥ pūrayituṃ na śakyam |
GE07bhg4c02u:3650: acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādaṃ tadvad eva kāmā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti bhogyatvenāyānti
GE07bhg4c02u:3651: yathā apāṃ praveśe apraveśe vā samudro na kam api viśeṣam āpadyate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3652: evam eva yaḥ kāmānāṃ bhoge abhoge ca
GE07bhg4c02u:3655: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ bhāvaṃ sphuṭayann āha āpūryeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3656: svarūpeṇaivāpūryamāṇaṃ tathāpy acala-pratiṣṭham anullaṅghita-velaṃ samudraṃ yathāpo 'nyā
GE07bhg4c02u:3657: varṣodbhavā nadyaḥ praviśanti, na tu tatra kiñcid viśeṣaṃ śaknuvanti
GE07bhg4c02u:3658: kartuṃ, tadvat sarve kāmāḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti na tu
GE07bhg4c02u:3660: śabdādiṣu tad indriya-gocareṣv api sat svātmānandānubhava-tṛptair vikāra-leśam apy avindan sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3661: yaḥ kāma-kāmī viṣaya-lipsuḥ sa tūkta-lakṣaṇāṃ śāntiṃ nāpnoti ||70||
GE07bhg4c02u:3663: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3666: prāptān kāmān vihāya tyaktvopekṣya aprāpteṣu ca niḥspṛhaḥ yato nirahaṅkāro 'taeva
GE07bhg4c02u:3667: tad-bhoga-sādhaneṣu nirmamaḥ sann antar-dṛṣṭir bhūtvā yaś carati
GE07bhg4c02u:3673: gṛha-kṣetrādīnāntarān manorājya-rūpān vāsanā-mātra-rūpāṃś ca pathi gacchaṃs tṛṇa-sparśa-rūpān kāmāṃs trividhān vihāyopekṣya
GE07bhg4c02u:3675: yato nirahaṅkāra śarīrendriyādāv ayam aham ity abhimāna-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3679: kaupīnācchādanādau mamedam ity abhimāna-varjitaḥ san yaḥ pumāṃś carati
GE07bhg4c02u:3680: prārabdha-karma-vaśena bhogān bhuṅkte yādṛcchikatayā yatra kvāpi gacchatīti vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3686: viśvanāthaḥ : kaścit tu kāmeṣu aviśvasan naiva tān bhuṅkte ity āha |
GE07bhg4c02u:3687: vihāyeti nirahaṅkāro nirmama iti deha-daihikeṣu ahaṃtā-mamatā-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3689: prāptān kāmān viṣayān sarvān vihāya śarīropajīvana-mātre 'pi nirmamo mamtā-śūnyaḥ nirahaṅkāro 'nātmani śarīre
GE07bhg4c02u:3690: ātmābhimāna-śūnyaś carati tad-upajīvana-mātraṃ bhakṣayati yatra kvāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:3691: gacchati vā sa śāntiṃ labhate iti vrajeta kim ity asyottaram ||71||
GE07bhg4c02u:3693: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3695: śrīdharaḥ : uktāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3698: enāṃ parameśvarārādhanena viśuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān prāpya na vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3700: yato 'nta-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'py asyāṃ lakṣa-mātram api sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇam brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam ṛcchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3701: kiṃ punar vaktavyaṃ bālyam ārabhya sthitvā prāpnotīti ||72||
GE07bhg4c02u:3705: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ caturṇāṃ praśnānām uttara-vyājena sarvāṇi
GE07bhg4c02u:3711: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir iti ca prāg uktā sthitir niṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c02u:3713: | he pārtha ! enāṃ sthitiṃ prāpya yaḥ kaścid api pnar na vimuhyati |
GE07bhg4c02u:3714: na hi jñāna-bādhitasyājñānasya punaḥ sambhavo 'sti anāditvenotpatty-asambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c02u:3715: asyāṃ sthitāv anta-kāle 'pi antye 'pi vaayasi sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3716: brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛttiṃ brahma-rūpaṃ nirvāṇam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c02u:3718: kim u vaktavyaṃ yo bramacaryād eva saṃnyasya
GE07bhg4c02u:3719: yāvaj-jīvam asyāṃ brāhmyāṃ sthitāv avatiṣṭhate sa brahma-nirvāṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:3729: jñānaṃ karma ca vispaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṃ bhaktim uktavān |
GE07bhg4c02u:3736: kiṃ punar ākaumāraṃ brahma ṛcchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c02u:3737: nirvāṇam amṛta-rūpaṃ tat pradam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c02u:3738: nanu tasyāṃ sthitaḥ kathaṃ brahma prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c02u:3741: niṣkāma-karmabhir jñānī harim eva smaran bhavet |
GE07bhg4c02u:3745: [*ENDNOTE] This is a reference to chapter 11.25. See VCT to 18.28.
